Review Content: Комфортабельный отель удачно расположенный в центре Виндхука с приятным персоналом, предлагающий дополнительные услуги и хорошие рестораны. Из отеля быстро можно пешком добраться до национального музея и картинной галереи или до мед центра  при необходимости сдать ПЦР тест.
Date: Date of stay: April 2022This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Staff 5 estrelas
Review Content: Hotel confortável na avenida principal de Windhoek com um pequeno mercado de artesanato local em frente ao hotel do outro lado da rua,  ATM a volta do hotel super acessível.  O staff é sem dúvida quem faz a diferença no hotel tive a oportunidade de conhecer e ser servido por Jurgen, Valéria e Vatima  todos eles super prestáveis, simpáticos e muito profissionais  são sem dúvida uma mais valia no hotel  e que podemos perguntar sobre algumas atividades e serviços na Namíbia. Voltaria sem dúvida ao hotel e iria querer ser atendido por eles. Há outra menina Amanda  acho eu, colega da Valéria, bastante simpática e que mostrou sempre disponibilidade para nos ajudar. Muito obrigado pela experiência que nos proporcionaram.
Date: Date of stay: July 2021This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: One Night in Windhoek
Review Content: Schönes Styling und angenehmes Ambiente. Insbesondere der Dachgarten ist einen Besuch wert ( Ausblich auf Windhuk). Preise sehr moderat. Service durchgängig gut.Frühstück könnte etwas mehr Abwechselung vertragen, jedoch gut.Lage in der Innenstadt ausgezeichnet und zentral, ohne das man dies akustisch merkt.
Date: Date of stay: December 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Road Map to Avani
Review Content: My stay was excellent however has  to improve on service deliverytraining of staff on the much needed component which is hospitality and service deliveryupgrade technology Wi-Fi,I could not access it
Date: Date of stay: October 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hotel molto grande e bello
Review Content: È stata l’ultima sera in Namibia e l’ho trascorsa in questo bellissimo hotel, le stanze sono grandi pulite e curate, grande anche il bagno.Il ristorante è strutturato per pasti a buffet, ma sono presenti cuochi per la cottura espressa di diverse pietanze, pasta, carne e a colazione uova e omelette. Anche la carta dei vini è abbastanza corposa e il personale di sala molto disponibile.Anche la reception è molto curata ed accogliente, ci sono diverse sale per congressi e dispone anche di casinò!
Date: Date of stay: September 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very good for a short stay in Winhoek
Review Content: Good for a short stay in the center of the city. So, excellent position and very good services. Colse toShops and within a shopping center where you can buy what necessary to start your trip in Namibia
Date: Date of stay: August 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Business trip to Windhoek
Review Content: Great place, friendly staff and everything you’d expect and more. You NEED to try the Sky Bar. Service there could be quicker, but it’s very friendly and complements the view! I have definitely found my hotel of choice in Windhoek!
Date: Date of stay: July 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hotel vicino al centro
Review Content: Camera grande e luminosa, generose anche le dimensioni del bagno, buona la pulizia. A mio parere ci sono però due note negative:- purtroppo nella sala in cui si mangiava l’odore del cibo era davvero molto forte e una volta finito di pranzare/cenare l’odore restava prepotentemente aggrappato a capelli e vestiti, - la tenda coprente in camera non era abbastanza grande da oscurare tutta la vetrata.Eravamo molto curiosi di vedere la piscina panoramica ma purtroppo era chiusa per lavori. Personale gentile e disponibile.
Date: Date of stay: November 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: good
Review Content: my stay was very comfortable, the hotel is strategically located in town sorrounded by many amunities and in a straight road from the airport. the beds were big and spacious and very confortable to sleep in. adjustable airconditioning too. it was good staying at your hotel
Date: Date of stay: April 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Facelifting reicht nicht
Review Content: Seit fast 20 Jahren steige ich fast jedes Jahr im Avani (früher: Kalahari Sands) ab, weil es einfach zentral liegt. Avani hat dem Hotel ein Facelifting verpasst, das sehr ansprechend ist. Geht man jedoch ins Detail, finden sich alte Probleme wieder, die von unten nach oben größer werden.Das neue Avani hat seine Rezeption und eine Bar ins Erdgeschoss verlegt. Das ist sicherlich eine gute Idee gewesen. Die Gästebetreuerin Loretta macht (seit vielen Jahren) einen fantastischen Job. Die Porter Jürgen und Nick(?) sind unglaublich hilfsbereit und schnell mit dem Gepäck, die Rezeption ist hilfsbereit und hilft bei Problemen und Buchungen.Die Mitarbeitenden der Bar im Erdgeschoss sind sehr freundlich und arbeiten gästeorientiert. Alles zusammen: Note 1.Will man von dort nach oben fahren, gibt es im neuen Avani alte Probleme: der Aufzug!Schon früher dauerte es zu Stoßzeiten lange, bis der Lift zu den Etagen kam. Nun gibt es ein intelligenteres System, das "Stockwerkhierarchien" erkennt, wenn es denn funktioniert. Am 1. Tag funktionierten alle drei Aufzüge nicht. Danach ging es unterschiedlich weiter. Ich bin mehrfach im Lift steckengeblieben. Allerdings ging nach kurzer Zeit der Aufzug wieder.Die Zimmer sind wie sie immer waren, mal so, mal so. Wir waren an unterschiedlichen Tagen während einer 5wöchigen Reise im Avani. Die Zimmerbreite reichte von ganz toll und sehr groß bis zu kaputten Duschwänden mit nicht abziehbarer Toilette, von tropfenden Klimaanlage, nicht funktionierendem Safe u.a. Die Zimmer konnten wir allerdings sehr schnell wechseln.Im Restaurant angekommen, war es wie immer: das Buffet ist morgens wie abends mehr als gut. Eine große Vielfalt mit vielen frisch zubereiteten Gerichten zu einem vernünftigen Preis. Wenn man - wie wir - mehrere Tage am Stück im Avani verbringt, wird es schnell langweilig. Das Personal ist  freundlich und schnell, einige auch unfreundlich und langsam. Ausdrücklich hervorheben möchte ich die Damen an der Kasse, die Reservierungen oder besondere Tischzusammenstellungen für Gruppen sehr schnell und kurzfristig erledigen.Gesamtnote: 3+Eine einzige Katastrophe war die neue Rooftopbar. Es reicht nicht aus, eine Etage über der Skybar im Hilton platziert zu sein. Den Pool inmitten der Sitzplätze wird wohl niemand ernsthaft nutzen wollen. Neun Leute stehen für die Bar dort hinter der Theke und starren die Kasse an, ohne sich in irgendeiner Weise zu bewegen. Wir waren an den beiden Eröffnungstagen dort, und es klappte nichts. Am dritten Tag wurde die neue Bar wieder geschlossen, weil nichts klappte. Nach 2 Wochen waren wir wieder dort. Es war nicht möglich, jemanden zu bitten, eine Bestellung aufzunehmen, nach einer weiteren Woche und dann noch einmal weiteren 2 Wochen war der Service nicht besser. Ich kann den Service nicht bewerten, weil es keinen gab. Andere Gäste waren glücklicher und erzählten, dass nach einer Stunde jemand eine Bestellung aufgenommen hatte.Gesamtnote: 6-Unterm Strich: gilt: Erdgeschoss arbeitet fantastisch. Zimmer durchwachsen, wenn man sich beschwert, bekommt man schnell gute Zimmer, Restaurant: Essen gut, Service gut bis mittelmäßig; Roof Top Bar und Pool: Katastrophe
Date: Date of stay: February 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: A REAL improvement
Review Content: The AVANI today used to be the Kalahari Sands Hotel ... but the renovation has changed this hotel around & upside down. Integrated a lovely little BISTRO at the bottom, next to reception. Free secure parking is still available,ask at the reception. Bedrooms are still on the old design & lay-out, but much lighter furnishing is used, very quiet, we slept well.  No breakfast is included in the price, a breakfast is at 250 NAD per person extra. This hotel is in City Centre, very good for business, across you have SLOWDOWN COFFEE , next to that an ICE CREAM PARLOUR and of course the BISTRO at AVANI ... nice places to go & have a light lunch or breakfast ... or just a good coffee. We were a bit hesitant booking this hotel coming from Seychelles, because the AVANI in Seychelles is old, stinky and definitely not new like this one. Their breakfast room has been upgraded, simpler but better quality. All over service friendly and efficient. Well DONE!
Date: Date of stay: January 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Met expectations
Review Content: I m very impressed by the quality service offered. Well trained people that have a high knowledge of working with people. I like the fact that there is always someone to attend to you whenever you want something at any given time. The speed of your Internet network intrigues me. I will never hesitate to recommend your hotel to a friend, family or any random acquaintance. The location is perfectly at the heat of Windhoek CBD which makes it easier for visitors to have prompt access to other services.
Date: Date of stay: November 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: freundlich und efektiv
Review Content: schöne geräumige Zimmer, freundliches hilfbereites Personal,HERVORRAGEDE Küche! Essen in Buffet-Form aber frisch zubereitet nach den Wünschen der Gäste.gute Lage im Zentrum von Windhouk. Alles Sehenswerte zu Fuß erreichbar
Date: Date of stay: October 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good location
Review Content: Location is good for shopping and seeing the sights.  Dinner was good.  Room was nice but there were problems with the elevator.  Food was good.  It is inside a shopping mall, you need to use the escalator in the mall to get to the hotel . When the escalator is not working,  carrying the bags was very difficult.  Tip ...If you are there on a Saturday the shops close early.
Date: Date of stay: December 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Junious and his manager are to be commended
Review Content: There was an issue when checking in to the presidential suite upon our arrival, and the initial staff member who dealt with the situation was well below par in her performance. I was very disappointed with the hotel on that occasion, so much so, that I almost changed our booking for our return visit. Upon returning, Junious greeted us at reception, and to his credit, I was pleasantly surprised when he remembered myself and my family from our previous visit. His manner and professionalism was outstanding. I also spoke to his Manager, a lovely woman whose name I can't remember, and she also was very professional and obviously passionate about her industry. The two of them are a credit to the Avani group. Having been in business for almost 30 years now, I would be proud to call either of them my staff member. All other staff members we interacted with were friendly and welcoming. Their restaurant was excellent, and we also used their downstairs bar for before and after dinner drinks, while watching the world cup and the bar staff were very friendly and couldn't do enough to help you. Bravo Avani.
Date: Date of stay: July 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Stay away while renovating
Review Content: What an awful experience. First room I was given, key didn't work. 2nd room already occupied. 3rd room was open. Room was serviced at 1815! Only 1 of 3 elevators worked. After waiting 10 minutes I was informed the down button on the 10th floor is not working. The one star is for breakfast which was great.
Date: Date of stay: June 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Travaux en cours.
Review Content: Beaucoup de nuisances dus aux travaux en cours, les ascenseurs qui ne fonctionnent pas. La connection WIFI est très problématique. Les bruits matinaux sont gênants. L'emplacement de l'hôtel est bien en centre ville à proximité des boutiques.
Date: Date of stay: April 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Staff gentilissimo
Review Content: centralissimo buona colazione ma quello che colpisce é la gentilezza degli addetti al ricevimento ecc. L hotel non é nuovissimo ma comunque buono come base in cittá buoni i servizi generali c é anche il casinó
Date: Date of stay: January 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bien situé
Review Content: nous avons séjourné en fin de circuit dans cet hôtel.il était très bien. belle chambre, belle vue sur la montagne, bon restaurant, très grand choix des plats surtout le petit déjeuner, très copieux, le personnel très souriant et accueillant.situé dans un centre commercial, avec beaucoup de boutiques (dont plusieurs de souvenirs)  et à l'extérieur, également de très beaux magasins, et possibilité de se promener aux alentour à pieds, au dessus de l'hôtel une très belle église et un grand monument (j'ai oublié le nom ) pour terminer un séjour, bien  dommage de n'être pas restés plus longtemps.
Date: Date of stay: October 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: A good hotel but with a few problems
Review Content: The hotel is centrally located with shops and restaurants nearby.  The rooms are large and comfortable with a large bathroom and effective a/c, tv. fried etc.  There is a problem in that the reception is one floor up from the street and the downward escalator was not working.  The key card we were issued with did not work, the promised water was not initially supplied and the lifts did not always operate as promised.  Nonetheless the staff were friendly and did eventually sort out all the problems.
Date: Date of stay: October 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: FACILE CAR PROCHE DE L'AEROPORT
Review Content: Bien localisé par rapport à l'aéroport (40mn) cet hôtel dispose de chambres très spacieuses avec deux grands lits. Très bonne literie. Frigo, tv, prises européennes dans la chambre. Wifi partout.Salle de bains fonctionnelle disposant de produits. Le restaurant propose une formule de buffets très variés et de très bonne qualité que ce soit le matin ou le soir. Le personnel en salle, de cuisine et à la réception sont très sympathiques et souriants. Il y a une salle de jeux dans l'hôtel et une galerie commerciale à la sortie.Quelques petits points négatifs : moquette dans les chambres, ascenseurs très lents (sur les 4 premiers étages + vite à pieds). Piscine : petite, glacée et eau légèrement saumâtre.
Date: Date of stay: September 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: An Excellent Place to Stay in Windhoek
Review Content: I have stayed at the AVANI Hotel on three occassions and have experienced excellent service where I have not had to call a receptonist, waitron or butler. There is always someone to assist with the lifts and which floor one needs to be. The restaurant staff are readily on hand to take your orders, clear used plates etc. The Reception staff acknowledge you even though they may be busy with someone else.What a pleasure to stay at the AVANI and I would not stay anywhere else in Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: September 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Avani in Winter
Review Content: I know the hotel since round about 17 years. Long-standing staff makes all visits like "coming home". Fortunately all renovations and reconstructions over the last years have been done very carefully. Breakfast: Offer of  sausage and cold meat should be improved. Was better in the past.
Date: Date of stay: July 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Comfortable stay
Review Content: I stayed at the Avani for 6 nights and overall had a very comfortable stay. There were a few cons to the hotel, but the bedroom and meals do make up for it.Pros:Amazing breakfast buffet! They serve almost every type of breakfast you can imagine. Lovely bedroom with big bed, flat screen, bath and shower.Friendly staffGreat coffee!Cons:Wifi only worked in the reception area and restaurant, in the bedroom it was very weak.Room service was poor - I called 3 times to remind them to bring my order.It was advertised online that there was a gym in the hotel, but there is no gym.The hotel is in the middle of a shopping mall in the city centre.
Date: Date of stay: June 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Gute Lage
Review Content: Das Hotel liegt in einem Einkaufszentrum mitten in Windhoek. Sehenswürdigkeiten wie z.B. das Independence Memorial sind zu Fuß in ca. 5 Minuten zu erreichen. Reichhaltiges Frühstücksbuffet. Sehr nettes Personal
Date: Date of stay: November 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Avani Hotel, the epitome of WIndhoek hospitality
Review Content: The hotel is very comfortable. The rooms are spacious and the WiFi is very good. However, the food, especially dinner gave me some problems. It seems like the food is left over from lunch. I advise room service for evening meals.
Date: Date of stay: March 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: ordentliches Hotel mit Schwächen
Review Content: Ich bin im Februar/März mit Unterbrechungen insgesamt 8 Nächte im Avani gewesen. 1. Fazit: Als Avani ist es genauso gut/schlecht wie als Kalahari Sands Hotel.Lage: ideal zum Zentrum gelegen. In wenigen Schritten ist man in der Innenstadt.Zimmer: sauber, geräumig, sehr gut. Safe vorhanden, Minibar auch, aber nicht gefüllt.Personal: sehr unterschiedlich. Rezeption: immer sehr gut und kompetent, bei Problemen stets um schnelle Lösungen bemüht. Restaurant: einige sehr nett, zuvorkommend und sehr um den Gast bemüht, andere völlig überfordert und inkompetent. Einige wenige mit ignoranter Arroganz. Beispiel: Der Getränkeausschank wurde wegen Umbaumaßnahmen auf die laute Terrasse verlegt. Eine Bierbestellung um 21.30 wurde nicht mehr angenommen, weil die Bar um 22.00 schließt.Beim 2. Besuch gab es wieder die "alte" Bar. Leider war keine Unterhaltung möglich, weil sehr laut Sportübertragungen oder andere Sendungen liefen. Da alle Zimmer TV haben, braucht die Bar diesen "Service" nicht auch noch zu bieten.Essen: bei einem längeren Aufenthalt merkt man, dass das Essen (außer freitags) immer das selbe ist. Buffet mit z.T. frischer Zubereitung und ausreichend, aber halt auch langweilig. Wenn Töpfe oder Schalen mit Salaten leer sind, dauert es lange, bis Nachschub kommt.Seit Jahrzehnten ein Dauerproblem: die drei Fahrstühle sind dem Gästeaufkommen nicht gewachsen. Gerade zu den Mahlzeiten geht man vom Zimmer besser zu Fuß als solange auf den Fahrstuhl zu warten, bis das Essen kalt geworden ist.
Date: Date of stay: March 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: SERVICE QUALITY REVIEW
Review Content: Overall it was a perfect stay. Staff are welcoming, the food is good and the rooms are also perfect, spacious and relaxing.i will very much recommend the hotel to my friends and family and will come back for my 15% welcome back discount.
Date: Date of stay: February 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Tolle Lage und gute Preise
Review Content: Das Hotel liegt mitten in Windhoek und man kann fussläufig alles gut erreichen (Christuskirche, Zoo Park, Craft Centre,...). Die Buchung über die eigene Homepage war einfach, gut verständlich und schnell. Preise sind vollkommen ok, Frühstück ist inbegriffen. Das Frühstück war super lecker und vielfältig, auch das Abendbuffet war abwechslungsreich und man konnte sich sogar selbst etwas zusammenstellen und dann frisch grillen lassen. Die Bedienungen waren immer freundlich. In der Bar kann man den ganzen Tag über essen und die Portionen sind groß und lecker. Ausgaben, die man innerhalb des Hotels tätigt, kann man aufs Zimmer schreiben lassen. Die meisten Gäste sind Einheimische oder aus anderen afrikanischen Ländern, was uns sehr gefallen hat. Dadurch wirkte das Hotel nicht wie ein "Touristentempel". Die Zimmer sind großzügig geschnitten und verfügen über ein großes Bad und eine Klimaanlage. Im Kühlschrank im Zimmer werden jeden Tag 2 gratis Flaschen Wasser aufgefüllt. WLAN ist im ganzen Haus erreichbar. Der einzige Haken war, dass wir bei Ankunft mit gesamtem Gepäck durch die anliegende Mall über defekte Rolltreppen eiern mussten, da der Lift defekt war. Das ist aber nicht unbedingt die Schuld des Hotels, daher kann man darüber hinweg sehen.
Date: Date of stay: December 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very good
Review Content: Conveniently close to CBD so within walking distance from business offices, while also offering nice views and access to recreational and tourist sites.Enough secure parking.Hotel newly refurbished AND facilities in good working order.
Date: Date of stay: November 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bel hôtel en centre ville
Review Content: Pour pouvoir rentrer dans l'hôtel, il faut monter au 1er étage d'une galerie marchande avec des escalators souvent en panne !!! Un casino est dans l'hôtel.Sinon, excellent accueil accueil et personnel professionnel et agréable.La chambre est grande, propre et dispose de tout le confort. Salle de bains avec baignoire/douche.Le restaurant est correct, mais il vaut mieux ne pas arriver trop tard sinon il y a moins de choix.PDJ sous forme de buffet (continental et Namibien)L'environnement de la piscine sur le toit mériterait d'être rénové car pour l'instant le lieu est assez glauque
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great Service
Review Content: Once again a great experience staying at the Avani.  Excellent service and great fascilities, the staff is always friendly and ready to assist.  The location of the hotel is perfect as it's situated within walking distance of main attractions and shops.Thank you Avani
Date: Date of stay: October 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Un bon 4 étoiles
Review Content: Situé sur la rue de l indépendance Hotel bien situé et très calme et propreGrande chambre spacieuse Le petit déjeuner est très complet et bon fruits frais viennoiseries Et pour les amateurs un casinoWifi gratuit
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: A decent hotel experience in an odd location
Review Content: We were travelling from the UK and needed a decent base for our first night in Namibia following a long journey and prior to setting off on our adventure exploring the country.We were a little surprised when, travel-weary, we arrived in Windhoek and were directed to a shopping centre car park. It was a bit of a struggle finding the Avani reception but when we did the staff were very pleasant, the room was spotless and well appointed and the breakfast was a plentiful, corporate-style buffet. We had to travel out to experience anything of Windhoek or anything with real character, not being in a casino frame of mind! Could have been anywhere really as has the feel of an airport hotel. But can't fault the service, sleep or facilities. Would recommend overseas visitors stay somewhere with a touch more "authenticity" perhaps as we will next time we're over.
Date: Date of stay: March 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: "its the little details that matter indeed"
Review Content: 29th july to august 1 - i enjoyed the great hospitality and warmness , great welkom and laughter too from every member of staff i encountered at the hotel.from the porters, and security to the supervisors and managers that i met briefly while staying with you - as my departure date and flight was rather early ,i was a bit disappointed that there was no one to assist in the dunes restaurant ( which only  starts breakfast service @ 6am), only after a few nudges with the hotel reception desk   , i had a chef come to assist  - and arranged for a quick meal for me and a breaky pack to take with - at least that helped -your buffets are wonderful, but i think steep - Hilton has good value for money too and slightly cheaper...( be competitive)one suggestion please  - kindly  realize that your national carrier airline has all international flights departing rather early on their schedule , please do make it a point to see that  when clients  travel itineraries are availed and you know their international flights depart early , please ensure that you offer your clients a breakfast  pack READY  to go, or better  a chef  and waiters in the restaurant to help clients have a quick meal before they leave the hotel for airport by 6 am.overall , i was happy to have stayed with you - was happy to have met lieze and oompie, great sounds and voices - beautiful people ..i thank you and will definitely be coming back to stay with you soonest . -with my family too. am sure the kids will enjoy it too.happy guest!!!!
Date: Date of stay: July 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Nice place
Review Content: Very nice hotel, confortable, the bedrooms are big enough, nice toilet, and the staff very sympathic!Close to Maerua mall, and 15min to the Groove mall.I'm having a great time, don't even want to leave the hotel, and for those who don't like to move you have many shops in the buldings, you can find the necessary juste there: souvenirs, clothes...
Date: Date of stay: June 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: A little bit unusual access to the Reception
Review Content: From the sidewalk you cross the mall of a Commercial Center, take the escalator to the first floor and have the entrance on your right. Some security guys around, so, it looks safe.The pool on the roof it small, but Namibia is a desert country, so, why complain? My criticism goes to the impossibility to have a free round look from the top floor. Sorry, no pictures! I would say that with some small improvements to take out the few sand out of the gears ( room key did not work and the safety box neither), it would be a perfect hotel with one of the best restaurants of Windhoek in short walking distance.
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Afrika Verign Nam
Review Content: This was the first time I sprayed there since the upgrade and new ownership. I was pleasantly surprised. The room was clean, and spacious. The WiFi was free and great. The breakfast good. Staff lovely.  The hotel is placed in the centre of town, great position, but not easy parking for visitors. If you like gambling it is ok, but if you don't, be aware there is a casino with the associated issues.
Date: Date of stay: April 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Most Enjoyable
Review Content: I stayed for a week at the AVANI for the first time a few months ago while on business. It was a very enjoyable experience with great service and friendly staff. It did not take me long to become a recognised face in any of the facilities and the restaurant staff went out of their way to cater for my needs. I'm heading back there for another week from Monday 22 Feb 2016 and look forward to the same. Nice conveniently situated above a nice mall and banking hall. Thank you AVANI, Job well done......
Date: Date of stay: October 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Casino
Review Content: This location has a large open air feel. The casino is modern and updated. The staff if helpful and Friendly. There are lots of machines to try your luck on and the floor has various tables to keep you spending. Make friends with the waitress and tip her well for free drinks, food, smokes etc.
Date: Date of stay: October 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great Location, Polite staff and reasonable prices
Review Content: I recently stayed at the Avani during a business trip to Namibia. The hotel as clean comfortable and well laid out. The staff were polite and courteous and went out of their way to assist. The food was very reasonably priced and very good. We mainly ate  from the buffet but it was a good standard of food and very reasonably priced. Breakfast was good with a huge range and evening meals had everything covered (fish, meat, vegetarian,) Very impressed and I would highly recommend.
Date: Date of stay: November 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: the food and rooms
Review Content: AVANI Windhoek hotel and casino has the most delicious food and the service are excellent ,when having dinner there are so many great variety of foods and deserts to choose from .the rooms in the hotel are very good beds, bathrooms amazing and the way the rooms are designed are great the hotel it self looks beautiful its so relaxing and their hotel is in the mall and also 5 minutes away from another mall
Date: Date of stay: September 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: BIG COMFORTABLE HOTEL
Review Content: This hotel is located at the centre of Windhoek, two storeys up from a shopping centre. Rooms are confortable, clean and well kept. Bar is well attended, reasonably priced and intimate.Restaurant (buffet) has a good quality food, good choice and fast service.All in all, not an unforgettable stay, but a good hotel to wind down after 5000 km of dirt roads at the end of a fantastic trip and get ready for the following morning flight back home.Some shops in the mall at the base of the hotel and some shops in the vicinity offer very nice products at almost reasonable prices.
Date: Date of stay: August 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: AAAC - Avoid at all cost
Review Content: We stayed at the hotel on a Saturday night, having to catch the plane the Sunday. Very disappointed! Only buffet dinner with no choice of a la carte. Streets not safe enough to find another restaurant in the vicinity. In any case very little other restaurants in the area. Drinks are overpriced. We ordered dinner from a very limited in-room dining menu - supposed to be a cheese and ham platter, but the ham was "something" disguised as ham and the cheese old and mouldy! Gross! Had a bad night's rest due to very noisy neighbors. Breakfast was VERY average and definitely not 4-star standard.Warm and cold water taps of the wash basin were swopped and the one tap did not work at all.The entrance to the parking and to the reception are badly sign-posted. Would not have found these, if I were driving on my own.Would not recommend this hotel to anyone.
Date: Date of stay: May 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Top Lage
Review Content: Das Kalahari Sands besticht durch seine absolute Top Lage. Mitten im Zentrum und man erreicht alles zu Fuß. Die Zimmer sind absolut in Ordnung. Frühstück ebenso.Immer wieder gerne komme ich ins Kalahari Sands.
Date: Date of stay: April 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent Services
Review Content: The hotel is in the centre of town where you can do your shopping, the facilities are beautiful although there is no lift for people with disabilities to reach the floor where the hotel is situated. Food is fresh and health and the service id of high quality.
Date: Date of stay: May 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: 部屋はとても綺麗
Review Content: ツアーで利用しました。部屋はとても綺麗でした。ただシャワーのお湯がぬるいうえに、真上に換気扇があるので寒くてシャワーを浴びるのが辛かったです。食事は他のホテルに比べると少し落ちるかなと感じました。あとレストランの従業員は少し愛想が悪かったように感じました。気のせいかもしれませんが。部屋は静かで問題無く眠れました。
Date: Date of stay: July 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Mmmm - Some attention to detail please
Review Content: I've stayed at the hotel on two occasions within a week. The room was very good, but I had a few "not so good" experiences. I only visited the restaurant for breakfast as I was too tired for dinner. Places should be set 100% with all cutlery - spoons at every cup. Plates should be placed at the breakfast point where the guest will dish up. The flow of the buffet should in a planned direction - not all over the place. Enough of the negatives.I had 150M of WiFi per night free, which was sufficient for the time in the hotel. The bathrooms were very clean and well appointed. Bed very comfortable and spacious. Will stay there again.
Date: Date of stay: April 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Well appointed
Review Content: The room was comfortable, clean and well appointed, and nice to have a good view over the city. The work area could have benefited from a more suitable desk chair, but it was good to have internet access. My room was opposite one of the service rooms, and there was quite a bit of noise early in the morning with staff moving in and out with cleaning equipment. There is a good selection of television channels and room service was prompt, with a fair range of reasonably priced meals. The breakfast was adequate, although staff could have been a bit more attentive. There was a delay during check-in of 30-minutes, although I checked in after 2pm.
Date: Date of stay: September 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Non male!!
Review Content: L'hotel è molto carino, il personale è molto cordiale (eccetto alla hall che sono di molte poche parole), le camere sono ampie, confortevoli e pulite!! Il ristorante lascia un pò a desiderare in quanto non c'è molto assortimento!! Ma tutto sommato ci siamo trovati benissimo... Ci torneremmo volentieri!!
Date: Date of stay: January 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bottom of the pile
Review Content: My girlfriend and I have just returned from a holiday in Namibia. We stayed in 3 hotels throughout the country, 2 were exceptional, 1 was terrible. Sadly this was the Kalahari Sands. Despite the location & housekeeping cleanliness being excellent this was a truly awful experience for 2 reasons:- Bad bad bad staff attitudes. This ruined the overall stay having to deal with rude, inattentive & inhospitable staff. The worst of which was a lady on the main reception (closely followed by the waitresses in the restaurant).- Poor quality food served on the buffet. Perhaps this was exaggerated by the terrible staff attitudes, however I'm always amazed at the buffet dogma of offering many dishes of low quality rather than a few tasty dishes. Specifically poor quality meat & no attention to how the food was presented.Fix the staff attitudes & improve the quality of food in the buffet (even if you raise the price) and this would be a much nicer hotel.
Date: Date of stay: December 2012This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good Stay in the Centre of Windhoek
Review Content: An excellent venue for short business trips to Windhoek, with all the amenities for a business travel in one building.
Date: Date of stay: August 2011This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Solides Hotel - Super Frühstück
Review Content: Dieses 4 Sterne Hotel gehört zu den besten in Windhoek. Wir hatten es über einen grossen deutschen Reiseveranstalter gebucht und zu einem super Preis bekommen. Die Zimmer sind schon älter, teilweise hat man eine grossartige Aussicht auf Windhoek! Direkt vor dem Hotel ein kleiner Souveniermarkt! Der Weg durch das Einkaufszentrum ins Hotel ist etwas kompliziert! Besonders hervorheben möchte ich das Frühstück, welches man bei super Wetter auch draussen auf dem Balkon einnehmen kann!
Date: Date of stay: October 2010This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: keine 3 Sterne
Review Content: Wir waren Ende Mai 2010 im obigen Hotel. Am Empfang ging es schon los. Unfreundlich und sehr langsam. Viele schreiben die Zimmer wären gut. Das stimmt. Allerdings im Bad hatte es Schimmel an den Fliesenfugen. Nebenan in unmittelbaren Nachbarschaft wird ein Gebäude hoch gezogen. Ab morgens um 6.30 Uhr ist an Schlafen nicht mehr zu denken. Das Wasser im Pool hatte gerade mal 15 Grad Celsius. Also von wegen baden!!Viel Personal aber oft unfreundlich. Das Personal kommt auf die Dachterasse an den Pool um öfters eine Zigarettenpause zu machen. Der Rauch ist sehr störend. In jeder Lodge hatten wir zumindest ein TV mit Naxchrichten aus Deutschland. In diesem Hotrel aber nicht. (5 Sterne???)Nie mehr Kalahari Sands. Ich kann das wirklich nicht empfehlen
Date: Date of stay: May 2010This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Regretted my stay in Kalahari Sands
Review Content: It all started at the reception area when we arrived.The ladies were arrogant and very impatient with us.The reception we got was very very unwelcoming.We booked into the "luxury room".Okay,the room was quite nice,big and well kept.We headed out to the resturant for dinner.None of the waiters even gave us a smile.we had to ask to be served with a drink.The buffet was not enjoyable at all. Also breakfast was just standard. We were there for 2 nights.The next day,we went out and came back around 1:30pm.only to find our room not made.We called housekeeping,they cleaned there and then,But to our disappointment again they could not offer us clean towels and sheets,apparently because the storeroom for towels was locked. The pool was unkept and unclean.I regretted staying in Kalahari Sands,especially that they dont treat clients with worth and value.Service levels are so so poor,en i did not appreciate at all.  Paying so much ,you expect a certain standard Service.But what experienced in Kalahari Sands was not even half of my expectation.
Date: Date of stay: December 2008This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: First experience in Avani
Review Content: The hotel is well located in center of Windhoek close to shopping places warm reception at arrival and departure. A bit disappointed got a surprised in the room was missing toilet brush… very embarrassing!!
Date: Date of stay: October 2023This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: If I could give a zero rating, I would
Review Content: I have travelled all over the world for business and pleasure. This is in the top 2 worst hotels I haves rated in. The other was a dingy place in northern Zambia.Service is definitely the worst of any hotel I have stayed in. I arrived at reception with my family around check in time. I was there on business and they wanted to see Windhoek sites. We checked in and I was told 15 minutes for our rooms to be ready as they wanted to put us on the same floor. We said it wasn’t necessary. After a couple of enquiries, they got us rooms almost 2 hours later, on different floors. Which we had to check in for again. Then they were upset with us because we were frustrated.They also ran out of key cards, so each room only received one key.I can speak for a very long time about the awful service across the hotel at every engagement with staff.The rooms are ok. Most things worked, but it is old, but mostly renovated. Room service took three attempts at reaching them, then the 15-30 minutes wait time was an hour and the order they delivered was wrong.A very painful stay.
Date: Date of stay: September 2022This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Incredible service
Review Content: Fluffy pillows and spacious rooms… this place is incredible. I visited for the first time Namibia and was thoroughly impressed by the entire experience. The service stood out above all else, particularly at the bar. The staff were not only friendly and professional but also went out of their way to make each guest feel welcome. Every drink was crafted with precision, and the bartenders had an impressive knowledge of cocktails, offering both classic favorites and unique creations. They were attentive, always making sure our glasses were never empty, and their warm conversations added a personal touch to our evenings.Beyond the bar, the entire hotel was impeccably maintained, with a serene atmosphere that allowed for both relaxation and adventure. The rooms were spacious, clean, and offered stunning views of the Namibian landscape. The dining experience was exceptional, with a menu that showcased the best of local and international cuisine. The hotel also offered excellent amenities, from the pool to guided tours, making it easy to explore the beautiful surroundings.I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Namibia. Whether you’re there for the wildlife or simply to unwind, the impeccable service—especially at the bar—ensures a memorable stay. I can’t wait to return!
Date: Date of stay: October 2024This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Beautiful ambience and excellent service.
Review Content: I had not been to the rooftop bar (Stratos) in over 4 years because of how terrible the service used to be, but yesterday I had an experience that would definitely guarantee my return. Keanu was an EXCELLENT server, he friendly, attentive and quick, at no point did we have to look for him as he constantly checked in to make sure we were well served.The food was delicious and worth its price, we had the oxtail and the lamb shank, chef Thomas did an excellent job in that regard👌🏾The supervisor Justina made sure to attend to every table to ensure guests were enjoying their evening. Overall a 10/10 experience.
Date: Date of stay: April 2024This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent service by Shahid
Review Content: The servicefrom Shahid Hi was excellent. Stratos offers a captivating dining experience with its fusion of global flavors and elegant ambiance. From the moment you enter, attentive staff guide you to your table in the sleek, modern setting. The menu impresses with its creative dishes, like the Stratos Sampler showcasing the chef's skill. Whether you indulge in perfectly grilled steaks or fresh seafood, every bite delights. Top off your meal with decadent desserts like the chocolate lava cake. With impeccable service and a commitment to culinary excellence, Stratos promises an unforgettable dining journey.
Date: Date of stay: March 2024This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Stratos
Review Content: My recent dining experience at Stratos was truly exceptional, largely thanks to our outstanding waiter, Jeremy. From the moment we were seated, Jeremy's warm and welcoming demeanor set the tone for our meal. He was attentive without being intrusive, offering menu recommendations that perfectly complemented our evening.Jeremy's extensive knowledge of Stratos's cuisine was evident, and he answered our questions with confidence and enthusiasm. Throughout the meal, his impeccable timing ensured our drinks were always refilled, and our courses arrived promptly. He even accommodated our special requests with a smile, making us feel like valued guests.Jeremy's outstanding service transformed our enjoyable meal into a truly memorable dining experience. His dedication and passion for his work were evident, and he made us feel special throughout our visit. I highly commend Jeremy for his exceptional service, which undoubtedly contributed to our overall satisfaction with Stratos. He is a true asset to the restaurant, and I eagerly look forward to returning to enjoy his exceptional service once again.
Date: Date of stay: November 2023This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Nice evening with good food & wine - perfect service
Review Content: Our first evening at Avani Windhoek. Dinner at Stratos, preceded by an aperitif in the rooftop bar. Buffy reserved the table we wanted, was immediately on hand with blankets and was very attentive and extremely friendly throughout the meal. The food was excellent.
Date: Date of stay: July 2024This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: WHO
Review Content: The service was good. All our requests were attended to. Most participants were very happy with the service and assistance from the staff.  The food was really good.  Very happy since the booking. David was really helpful with his team.
Date: Date of stay: October 2022This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Breathtaking
Review Content: Avani Windhoek stratos Restarant. This is so far the best rooftop restaurant in the city. The food is of great quality, mouth watering and served warm. The team members are always ready to assist and they have great menu knowledge. Thank you Justina and your team always for the great service. I’m definitely coming back.
Date: Date of stay: January 2023This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Statos
Review Content: I was on the roof top bar Statos. We really enjoyed our time there. The service was excellent. Shahid and Jeremy were attentive to all our needs. Shahid asked us about our drinks and took our feedback afterwards. Shahid asked us about the pina collada which we thought was too sweet and he told us that he will review the dosage of the vanilla syrup so that it is less sweet in the future. This kind of attention to details and proactiveness is really impressive. We are really in awe of their excellent service. They are definitely an asset to your organisation.
Date: Date of stay: September 2023This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Drug Resistant Tuberculosis Training.
Review Content: The hotel location, staff, food and guest experience is absolutely amazing. The conference facility catered to more than 60 individuals and whatever minor technical difficulties we experienced, an expert dealt with the problem immediately. I would definitely recommend Avani for anyone looking to book for whatever reason. I’d like to give a special thank you to the following staff members:  1. Kavee, Tia, Jurgen, Lyla, Nico, Gabriel and Kuuoke. Thank you!! 🤩

Name: Stratos
Review Content: Lenize was the best waiters I have ever met ‘ bought my drinks from on top to downstairs’ she is really someone who would make you comfortable’ to the extend that you don’t have to think about how your other dink you come along ‘ I have never been so satisfied by a waitress as I have by her ! I really hope she gets the recognition that she deserves! Cause she’s amazing

Name: Greta Evening
Review Content: The food was great. Superb toasted whole-wheat bread. It’s affordable. They have a wide range of items on the menu. Ambiance around the pantry coupled with the city lights outside is truly breathtaking. Thank you David for your awesome service.

Name: Amaaaazing!!!!
Review Content: It was an incredible experience that my family and I were able to experience! It was the first time we stayed at Avani, but it was the first time of many, many others. Very well located, very comfortable rooms, very precise and attentive service! It has restaurants inside that give you the opportunity to choose your menu. Not to mention that on the 15th floor we can enjoy a wonderful view, witness a beautiful sunset and that Happy Hour to relax!

Review Content: The restaurant has great food and spectacular reviews.If you go, I recommend asking for the hostess Buffy as she is wonderful very attended, respectful whatever they’re paying her is not enough.Don’t pass this opportunity you will not be disappointed.Max

Name: STRATTOS BAR
Review Content: My stay was awesome, drinks and Food was good and I will definetly come back again. Name: Great hotel!
Review Content: The hotel was great! The staff were extremely friendly and hospitality was top tier! The hotel also has various entertainment options and the breakfast buffet is great! The only con I have is that the in room dining was sometimes missing items from the meal and it was difficult to get hold of them again. Otherwise everything was great and would recommend to anyone going to Windhoek!

Review Content: Me and my lady often cist the stratos restaurant and I must say we are exceptionally impressed with the service provided by Michaela. She shows so much pride in the work she does. She is professional and also very entertaining. We'll done Michaela u are great. Keep up the good work.

Name: Clean, comfortable room and friendly service
Review Content: Service at reception and check in was very friendly and helpful. Reception staff also arranged a taxi and reservation at a restaurant.My room was very comfortable and clean and offered everything I needed. The hotel was being renovated while I was there, which was a bit of an inconvenience.The hotel restaurant was nice, but a little pricey for the variety and quality. I had breakfast and dinner here and both were average. Very little vegetarian options (even potato salad contained ham).Positives:Free Wifi worked very well in room.Complimentary water in bar fridgePillow menu (which I did not get to try, sadly)The hotel is situated in a little shopping mall with food and clothing stores, a pharmacy, a department store with gifts and souvenirs and a few small daytime restaurants.Negatives:Only one lift was working, so getting in and out took some time waiting or taking stairs to 9th floor.Upon arrival the tv and air conditioner in the room were both out of order, so my first night was a hot one.The shower door in the room came off its rails every time I opened or close it.On two occasions cleaning staff enter my room without knocking while I was there (I checked in early).
Date: Date of stay: November 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Luci ed ombre
Review Content: Nulla da dire sulla posizione centrale e sulle camere perfette. Ma purtroppo l entrata è al secondo piano del centro commerciale sottostante. Il che significa portare le valige dal posteggio sulle scale mobili lottondo con la gente che si reca a fare shopping Significa confusione nella quale sono spariti nel giro di due ore un telefono( con destrezza) ed un vetro rotto ad una delle nostre auto con relativa valigia sparita nonostante la sorveglianza(?!) . Veramente senza criterio
Date: Date of stay: December 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Ottimo hotel a Windhoek
Review Content: E' un hotel proprio nel centro di Windhoek con l'entrata al primo piano di una galleria commerciale. Le stanze sono molto grandi, pulite, confortevoli e con tutti i comfort. Il ristorante é a self service con una scelta molto vasta dove c'é solo l'imbarazzo della scelta,  comodo il prezzo fisso molto conveniente a cui aggiungere solo le bevande. All'entrata oltre alla reception c'é anche un casino dove passa diversa gente. Abbiamo passato qui l'ultima notte in Namibia  ricordando con nostalgia i nostri campi tendati.Consiglio questo hotel perché é in centro si puo' uscire tranquillamente a fare spese, e nelle vicinanze si puo' andare a visitare la vecchia chiesa di Windhoek e i giardini dove crescono bellissimi fiori tipo jakaranda e bouganville.
Date: Date of stay: November 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Durchschnittliches Hotel in guter Lage
Review Content: Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral an der Haupteinkaufsstrasse und die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten von Windhoek kann man bequem zu Fuß erreichen. Durch das angrenzende Parkhaus mit direktem Übergang zum Hotel ist das Hotel auch für PKW - Reisende zu empfehlen. Unten im Gebäudekomplex befindet sich ein kleines Einkaufszentrum mit Supermarkt, was zum Auffüllen der Vorräte sehr praktisch ist.Damit sind aber auch bereits alle positiven Aspekte aufgezählt worden. Das Personal war nicht sonderlich freundlich und wollte uns trotz gültiger Onlinebuchung ein anderes Zimmer zu einem erhöhten Preis zuweisen. Das erhaltene Zimmer war ausgesprochen klein und nicht sonderlich gut eingerichtet.
Date: Date of stay: October 2011This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bon hôtel pour une arrivée ou un départ
Review Content: Dernière nuit de notre séjour en Namibie. On est loin du charme des lodges mais on est dans la capitale. Bel hôtel de qualité. Les chambres sont vastes et offrent une belle vue sur la ville face au Hilton. Belle salle de bains. Tout est bien sauf la livraison des bagages qui a pris plus d une heure... Bien situé pour faire ses derniers achats au marché artisanal juste en face ou dans une boutique à 200 m en sortant si vous êtes pressé par le temps ! Très bon buffet petit-déjeuner.
Date: Date of stay: September 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: World-class hotel and service!
Review Content: Great renovations/upgrade done on this hotel. Rooms are modern, spacious and beautiful. Buffet provided at breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is a better selection at lunch than at dinner. Meat lovers and seafood lovers are catered for. All you can eat oysters for lunch and Chinese Chow Mein as desired. The Stratos (rooftop terrace bar) has the best views and the bar boasts with a variety of imported drinks. Slight criticism is the music played at the rooftop bar that doesn’t cater for everyone. All in alla great stay at the hotel with world-class service!
Date: Date of stay: May 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: AWFUL SERVICE
Review Content: We stayed there for one night, we had to wait 1 hour and 20 mins for a sandwich at the restaurant. Other people in the group tried to order room service and after 2 hours they didn´t get their meal. The elevator didn´t work, so we had to use the service elevator and the wait was almost 10 mins. Te rooms are spacious and clean.
Date: Date of stay: July 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very nice place
Review Content: The rooms here are very comfy and clean, nice looking - actually exceeded my expectations. The buffet lunch was better than the breakfast but both are fairly good. The only nitpicks would be the shower is tiny, which is odd given how large the bathroom is (why not just have the shower in the tub?) and the elevators were extremely crowded and slow. The women at the front desk are very nice and helpful and let me have a late checkout which was great considering my flight was late. Some rooms have better views than others. The first time I stayed here I was looking at a construction site but the second time I had a higher floor with mountain and city views.
Date: Date of stay: October 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great stay, good food, great welcom
Review Content: I traveled to Namibia for my daughter wedding and stayed with the Avani Windhoek Hotels.The welcome was extremely over the moon as we arrived,Hilya served us some juice, some brownish chocolates(very delicious) and as we checked in and settled well.The restaurant and a variety of food and very tasty.I feel at home being in Namibia fro the first time.
Date: Date of stay: April 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Qualidade e Bom Gosto a Preço Justo
Review Content: Situado no centro da baixa da capital namíbiana, repleta de edifícios históricos que datam da época colonial alemã,o Hotel & Casino Avani é a opção mais acertada para quem procura onde ficar em Windhoek com todo o conforto e com uma boa relação preço qualidade.Encontra-se a cerca de 30km do aeroporto, e perto de tudo quanto á de interessante para ver e fazer na cidade; para os amantes de arquitectura Windhoek tem uma interessante mistura de arquitectura moderna com edifícios históricos que valem a pena serem visitados, incluindo a Alte Feste (Antigo Forte) e a Christuskirche (Igreja de Cristo), para os amantes de artesanato está a cinco minutos a pé do interessantíssimo Arts & Crafts Center onde pode encontrar de todo o tipo de artesanato oriundo de todos os cantos do país e os amantes de gastronomia também ficaram satisfeitos pois está localizado perto dos melhores restaurantes de Windhoek, entre eles o famosíssimo "Joe's".O Hotel & Casino Avani, oferece quartos muito bem decorados e com um máximo de conforto (conectividade total Wi-Fi, mini-bar...) A nível de lazer como o nome indica o hotel conta com um grande casino, bar e uma piscina na cobertura. O restaurante tem um excelente serviço e ótima gastronomia.A meu ver a única coisa que possa apontar é a vista, não que seja má mas não é nada de especial.
Date: Date of stay: December 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Buen hotel
Review Content: El hotel está en el mismo edificio de un centro comercial, con lo cual estas rodeado de tiendas. En el sótano también hay un supermercado. Al otro lado de la calle también hay un mercadillo de artesanía. La zona está en expansión y había algún edificio al lado en construcción. Al asomarte por las ventanas te das cuenta de lo pequeña que es la ciudad y que este edificio es de los más altos de la zona.Estuvimos en él nada más llegar a Namibia y aunque la capital es muy pequeñita en comparación con las capitales europeas el hotel es grande y tiene estilo internacional. Habitación  y cuarto de baño amplios, buenos e impecables. Las instalaciones comunes  están bastante bien. El desayuno, estilo bufet, nos gustó; tenía varios alimentos estilo africano y también productos de estilo internacional.Fue un buen comienzo para nuestra aventura en Namibia!
Date: Date of stay: August 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very very average
Review Content: This hotel was nothing to write home about. Décor was pleasant, if bland. There was a persistent bad smell in my room. The only good thing was the separate stand-alone shower in the bathroom. It's located in the city centre - not the greatest ambiance. Service was atrocious - especially in the conference centre.
Date: Date of stay: August 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Easy
Review Content: Facilmente raggiungibile dall'aereoporto, l'hotel è dotato di un parcheggio non troppo comodo tuttavia le camere sono pulite ,spaziose e confortevoli.... ristorante per cena e colazione a buffet sono una piacevole sorpresa in quanto ricchi di tanti gradevoli piatti
Date: Date of stay: January 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Culture of anti-service
Review Content: So the hotel is mediocre and the staff is disinterested, but the deal with the internet is horrendous.First, you can't get internet service at the front desk.  You are required to go up a floor to the "business center."  Like I said, it is almost as if they brain-stormed way to make accessing wifi as painful as possible.  So either go up to your room to put down you luggage and come back downstairs to but an internet voucher, or drag all you stuff with you.Then wait in line, because the process takes for ever and there is always a line.  So then, it turns out that they give out vouchers at the front desk after the business center closes for hte evening.  So I asked the clerk why they couldn't just hand out the vouchers when you check in, instead of fording everyone to go to a whole different part of the hotel?  Her answer was "then what would I do?"  So the hotel is essentially inconveniencing it's guests to make work for another employee to sell you internet service.  It's anti-service.Then choose an overpriced internet access plan from the menu.  And if the system works they print you off a voucher that then lets you know that you have purchased "bandwidth shaped" wifi.  Bandwidth shaped, in this case means that the network is throttled down to dial up speed.Now you have spent 30 minutes to purchased internet that is painfully slow, kicks you off every twenty minutes and is overpriced.  Thanks for making my stay miserable.Post script  - It took me three attempts to post this review, because the stupid, punish the customer internet service requires me to log in every few minutes.... aaarrrrrrrrghhhhhh!!!!!!!!
Date: Date of stay: June 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Fair for Business
Review Content: This hotel is just fair - the better hotel would be the Hilton up the street.  I will say that the rooms are decent American size/style and clean - wifi is fair and the restaurant is very limited.  The staff is nice and willing to try - however they do not quite deliver as one would expect for the rates.
Date: Date of stay: November 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Average yet practical
Review Content: I stayed at this hotel in April 2013. I was travelling on business. The room was comfortable and spacious with two double beds. , the quality of deco was good, food at restaurant was average and the service was average. For a four star it  was not too bad. However friends of mine who were travelling with me complained about their rooms , apparently , the wing where I stayed was newly renovated. Theirs was the old wing , one of them spotted a cockroach in her room. Not quite what you would expect in a hotel room. No gym inside the hotel. Hotel located in a shopping mall in the business district which was practical as I was 2min from the office. They have a casino for those who like to gamble. They have a pool on the roof top, with limited space though. Overall average experience.
Date: Date of stay: April 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hotel centrale e ottime camere
Review Content: Ottima posizione nella zona dei negozi.Camere pulite, confortevoli e spaziose, bagni anche (doccia e vasca separate).Il ristorante a buffet è buono, c'è ampia scelta per la cena e anche per la colazione.L'ultimo giorno dovendo partire prima dell'apertura del ristorante, ci hanno fatto prenotare la colazione in camera senza alcun extra.Non ho avuto tempo per poter usufruire degli altri servizi, come la spa.
Date: Date of stay: August 2012This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Schlechtestes hotel unserer 2 wöchigen Namibiareise
Review Content: Absolute Enttäuschung . Waren mit 4 köpfiger Famlilie vorher auf einer Farm in Omaruro und hatten telefonisch spomtan die letzte Übernachtung in Windhoek vor Abflug gebucht. Auschhlaggebend war vor allem für die kids der Pool auf dem Dach. Bei Ankunft ( nicht bereits bei Buchnung, wir wären sonst auf der Farm geblieben ;-)) erfuhren wir, daß nicht nur der Pool, sondern auch das gesamte Hotel "under construction" ist. Trotz Nachfrage wurden uns keine Alternariven in Windhoek angeboten. Am nächsten Morgen begann der Baulärm um 6:00, die Cornflakes beim Frühstück bestamdem aus 3 übrig gebliebenden Krümeln, ein Nachschub war nicht möglich, der warme Kakao brauchte 30 (!) Mintuten. Alles in allem herscht hier die Beklemmung der 80er DDR Jahre. Absolut nicht empfehlenswert !!!!!!!!
Date: Date of stay: April 2011This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Thank you Avani Hotel & Casino for a job well done please keep it up.

Name: Windhoek’s best rooftop
Review Content: Would I stay here during my next visit. Yes, I would. Avani hotel is located on Independence Street in the very city center, very, very close to Christuskirche and the Independence Museum, shopping mall (one is the same building), cafes etc.You have super views over the city from the hotel sky bar and restaurant. Food was good. Perfect for sunsets. The pool is small, but with amazing views. The gym is small. Breakfast was good, but very crowded when I was there.  It is not like Avani Riverside and Seen sky bar in Bangkok where I just came from, might expectations where not the best arriving here.  My conclusion is that I still really like Avani Windhoek even though it is time for an update.

Name: Rude, lazy and incompetent casino staff.
Review Content: Tonight I visited the casino at Avani Hotel and Casino in Windhoek. I was shocked to the core to witness a staff member, infact one of the pit bosses Otilie getting in an argument with a client, after a customer dispute on the roulette table. I don't know the exact bone of contention, but having to watch a senior employee with the company threatening to physically beat and assault a client to the point that her colleagues had to hold her back shocked me to the core.Irregardless what the customer did or said to anger her, she should have removed herself from the situation and let her colleagues deal with the client that was visibly upset.The sad part about this is that this type of incidences has been a regular occurrence here, and on top of it you have staff that are plain rude, lazy and incompetent. When you complain about the disgusting customer service, they tell you to go somewhere else if you not happy with them.Management has been informed numerous times but they don't seem to care!
Date: Date of stay: December 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
