Name: Buen hotel moderno
Review Content: Nuestra habitación (muy limpia) era muy amplia con 2 camas dobles y un cuarto de baño con bañera y ducha separada, amueblada en el estilo típico e impersonal de las cadenas hoteleras. Buen desayuno muy variado. Personal agradable y servicial.
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Laid back service; adequate accommodation
Review Content: The entrance to this hotel is situated in a small shopping centre and it offers a restaurant, bar and casino.The hotel feels a bit dated; rooms are clean and adequate; service is laid back with a general attitude of "tomorrow is another day".  Check-in was slow and the assistance seemed preoccupied; check-out was delayed as the assistance was busy with "admin" and not available immediately.The rooms are adequate; room service is good and offers great value (better than the Dune restaurant that only offers a buffer or pizza dinner).All in all an average experience, as far as hotels go.
Date: Date of stay: July 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bon hôtel avec situation au centre-ville
Review Content: Séjour au début d'un voyage organisé dans cet hôtel moderne (ancien Kalahari Sands) situé en plein centre de la ville et dont l'entrée se trouve au premier étage d'un centre commercial. Chambres spacieuses, confortables, propres et calmes, mais sans caractère. Buffet petit-déjeuner varié et de bonne qualité. A conseiller
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Namibia trip
Review Content: Good conditions. Nice buffet. Could have a better pool (very cold on topi of building)Bad to be inside a shopping mall. Parking lot with surveillance but not well marked as hotel parking.Nice people.
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Only the location saves this over priced hotel
Review Content: I got stuck and needed a place to sleep, so I stayed here. Read my other reviews, I try to find positives: this hotel is right in the city centre, so it is super easy to get around and great for a night or two. It seems good for business travellers, but I didn't find the quality equal to the excessive price. There is no water pressure. The lights have a strange on off system and in my room the exhaust fan in the bathroom went all night disturbing my sleep.  There is nothing in the mini bar, you can go downstairs to the bar, but nothing in the room. The quality of shampoo and conditioner is poor. WiFi drops out in the morning as people wake up: like most of the city yes. The breakfast has everything you want. The staff are lovely but impersonal. There is better value and better just out of the city centre if you have transport. Stay if you want the location.
Date: Date of stay: April 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Local bem honesto
Review Content: O hotel é bem honesto, preço bom o serviço atende as necessidades a contento, o café da manhã também é razoável porém fuja do almoço e do jantar!!!Tem um cassino pra quem gosta parecia interessante porém essa não é minha praia então não posso falar muita coisa!!!!
Date: Date of stay: February 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Mediocre
Review Content: I know Avani took over from previous owners. But they need to invest in new furniture and carpeting and towels. The furniture is chipped the carpeting is stained the towels are stained. I don't believe they deserve the four stars. A pity.
Date: Date of stay: January 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good Business Hotel
Review Content: The Hotel is according International Standard, with comfortable rooms and beds, view on the city and inside a shopping centre. What it lacks is a garden. The roof top pool has little greenery and was even in hot November cold. I had a few problems, such as not working of the safe and the door that did not lock. Although it was solve within 30 to 60 minutes by very friendly staff, it is inconvenient, if you want to leave on time. It is more a business hotel as for  a holiday.
Date: Date of stay: November 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: ホテルの名前が変わりました
Review Content: 現在の名前は AVANI WINDHOEK HOTEL & CASINO です。以前にも別件でホテル名が変更になった情報をアップしたことがありますが、せっかくの情報がホテルの情報丸ごと削除されてしまった経緯がある為、詳細は割愛させていただきます。
Date: Date of stay: September 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Nice room, good sleep quality, poor service...
Review Content: Check-in was confused, housekeeping closed early and no one else had keys to the supply room, sleep quality and bathroom great, cappuccino served at breakfast was my worst of 2015, very slow lifts... Strangely enough I'd stay there again when on business in Windhoek
Date: Date of stay: May 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good hotel in a central location
Review Content: I stayed for a few nights here while giving a training. The rooms were well designed and very comfortable. The buffet  breakfast and dinner was really good value, the sea food day is well worth the cost.  The location within the shopping complex is super and there are craft markets nearby with African artifacts which were not too pricey. Walk to the Hilton rooftop to have drinks, well worth the visit.
Date: Date of stay: April 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Pricey
Review Content: The rates sometimes vary from day to day and there is lack of balcony access. Security is adequate and it's casino is packed with all who have faith in nothing. Otherwise the food is great but it's not a budget hotel
Date: Date of stay: November 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hotel per uomini d'affari cinesi...
Review Content: L'hotel si trova all'interno di un centro commerciale sulla via principale di Windhoek, se si arriva di sera monta un po' di desolazione, soprattutto vista la quantità di guardie giurate che girano per i piani del centro con manganello in mano.Entrati nella hall tutto appare ben arredato e con l'aspetto del tipico albergo di grande città che basa la clientela più su viaggi d'affari che sul turismo.A destra dell'ingresso c'è un casinò con altre guardie con meta detector...Le camere sono molto ampie e spaziose, pulite e con bagno con sia doccia che vasca.Altra nota un po' dolente è la qualità del servizio sia del bar che del ristorante, i camerieri sono i più svogliati di tutta la Namibia e sembra ti facciano un favore a servirti un caffè...Considerato che per noi è stato il punto di partenza del viaggio giusto perché abbastanza vicino all'aeroporto si può anche soprassedere sul servizio...
Date: Date of stay: August 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: A good hotel with room for improvement
Review Content: The hotel location is good and could not be more central to all business and other activities in Windhoek. With the hotel being part of the Sun chain of South African hotels it also comes with their standards - and with a casino. The room on the 5th floor was fine and rather spacious, all amenities were in good shape and the bedding was comfortable. The only downside is that you have to pay for internet access - they offer a number of access plans which are not too expensive, but still, other hotels in Namibia offer this for free. The internet speed was rather slow, despite the payment....never mind, I would have no hesitation to return to this hotel in future.
Date: Date of stay: July 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Mixed experience
Review Content: The hotel is in a great central location, clean and comfortable. Food is great at breakfast and evening times. Reception and service werwe very good! Wifi is not free and when I left the hotel at 5:00 in the morning, the lift did not work and I had to go 14 stairs by foot with my bags...This did not happen before this time.
Date: Date of stay: February 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Kalahari Sands
Review Content: This is one of the best hotels I have been too, the staff were friendly, courteous and ever so helpful and the fact that its situated in a mall makes it even more appealing. The rooms are large, airy and spacious, and the view of the city is breath taking!!!
Date: Date of stay: May 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great rooms, typical African lack of professionalism and service
Review Content: Great rooms, mediocre food, check in took 40 minutes even though I am a regular stay member. Really dirty under beds, however rooms are great and hotel in general is ok, however some of the upperclass boutique hotels and guesthouses in Windhoek are probably much better value for money
Date: Date of stay: February 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: buon hotel, scomodo raggiungerlo
Review Content: l'hotel si trova nel centro della cittadina, e nel mezzo di un centro commerciale, per cui se non ti accorgi che nel corridoio di ingresso del centro commerciale  c'e'  un'entrata che ti porta direttamente  alla hall dell'hotel, ti devi trascinare su per 2 rampe di scale mobili le valigie, il che risulta abbastanza scomodo.Le stanze sono grandi, silenziose e pulite, il bagno ha doccia e vasca separati,il buffet ottimo e con ampia scelta e con prezzi contenuti, il caffe' migliore lo si beve al bar, quello del ristorante e' il caffe' americano messo nella tazzina da espresso, mentre al bar ci hanno servito un caffe' fatto con le cialde da bar. La piscina nel roof e' piccola e si vede che non e' molto frequentata , in quanto nell'acqua c'erano foglie e altro che galleggiavano, ho provato a entrarci , ma la temperatura dell'acqua non era gradevole.ho soggiornato per 2 notti nell'hotel in andata e in rientro da un soggiorno in un lodge park safari dell'interno,per cui tutto sommato, l'hotel va benissimo per questo tipo di soggiorno.
Date: Date of stay: November 2012This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very nice place!
Review Content: We booked this only as a stop-over between traveling from Sossusvlei to Etosha and were pleasantly surprised. Great location – near everywhere we needed to be in Windhoek and we especially enjoyed the casino. Nice buffet – limited choice to what we came from at Sossusvlei Lodge, but acceptable. Staff were friendly and helpful with our early departure the next morning.
Date: Date of stay: October 2011This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Central Location, does what it says on the tin but not too much individual personality
Review Content: I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in total on a visit to Namibia for work. After a long couple of flights it was great that the hotel was not more than 45 minutes from Windhoek airport. Great picture of The Queen and Prince of Edinburgh in the lobby who stayed there about 15 - 20 yrs ago. Got checked in efficiently. Good size rooms and cant complain at all. Its located on the central main street in Windhoek so there are restaurants on the same road in both directions. Atmosphere changes alot later on at night so my advice would be to eat relatively early. There was work on the hotel going on with some strange knocking sounds up to about 10pm that disturbed me a bit but then they stopped. OK breakfast - other reviews rave about it...Im not so thrilled, its a very average buffet in my opinion. Pool is basically a "plunge pool" on the small roof terrace but its nice to have the option for some fresh air. To sum-up - this hotel is basically a "safe pair of hands".... no individual personality but located centrally and close to the shops - you access the hotel through a shopping mall with a supermarket at the bottom level - so it is just very handy. I also felt very secure with lots of staff around in the lobby so that was an important plus.
Date: Date of stay: November 2010This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bello, ma forse poco adatto alla Namibia
Review Content: E' un grande albergo nel pieno centro di Windhoek. Vi si accede da una sorta di Centro Commerciale. E' un megapalazzo, poco adatto al resto della Namibia, ma dotato di tutti i piu' modernic confort, molto ben curato.
Date: Date of stay: September 2007This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Très bon hôtel
Review Content: On a passé deux nuits au Kalahari Sands en arrivant pour notre voyage de 6 semaines en Afrique Australe. La chambre sans être merveilleuse est fonctionnelle, deux grands lits, une télé , un coffre fort une grande salle de bains. Seul gros problème le chauffage ne marchait pas et au mois de juillet il fait bien froid la nuit! Le Hall est beau et le petit casino attenant est sympathique. Sa situation centrale dans Windhoek en fait un lieu idéal.Les buffets sont excellents aussi bien au petit déjeuner qu'au dîner.
Date: Date of stay: July 2007This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Concierge
Review Content: I had a awesome stay at Avani I must say the check in was perfect and awesome I could add, all the services and faculties are perfect this group has such a work ethic that doesn't dely. I can remember when we arrived there was so many groups checking in and this hotel was prepared no complaints from any person. The reception is honestly highly alert and busy but still they could smile and help others. Am part of the MOHSS group and we are always booked here and this hotel has made it such a wonderful experience all the time. Thank you Tia, Kave, Shaleen, Nico, Manfred, Marx ,Gabriel,Jurgen, Rejoice, Lyla Kuoko. This group knows customer service.
Date: Date of stay: August 2023This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Windhoeks finest service and food
Review Content: Amazing service by a charming hotel team. Great location in Windhoek, with beyond doubt the best rooftop bar and restaurant in the city called Stratos. Stayed only one night but definitely coming back to stay soon. Recommend the Avani Business Room as it has Bose speakers, great desk and large computer monitor so allowed me to mix business and pleasure.

Name: Stratos
Review Content: Jeremy, my experience with you as my waiter was truly exceptional. From the moment you greeted me with a warm and welcoming smile, I felt instantly at ease. Your friendly and attentive service made dining at this establishment a memorable and enjoyable experience.Your knowledge of the menu was impressive, and your recommendations were spot-on. I appreciate the patience you showed as I asked questions and made my selections. You went the extra mile to ensure that my dining preferences and dietary restrictions were accommodated, which made me feel valued as a customer.Throughout the meal, you were always there when I needed you, yet never intrusive. Your timing in delivering courses and refilling drinks was impeccable. It's evident that you take pride in your work and genuinely care about the satisfaction of your guests.Your enthusiasm for the cuisine and the establishment itself was infectious, and it added to the overall ambiance of the evening. You made the dining experience more than just a meal; you made it an enjoyable and memorable occasion.I want to express my gratitude for your outstanding service, Jeremy. You are a credit to this restaurant, and I look forward to returning here in the future, knowing that I'll be in excellent hands with you as my waiter. Thank you for making my dining experience truly wonderful.
Date: Date of stay: November 2023This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Avani Business Stay
Review Content: Efficient, friendly and helpful staff. Very nice facilities and well located in the centre of town. Wifi was a bit slow at times, mainly in the evenings. Nice buffet breakfast to get you going, Rooms are soundproof.

Review Content: I visited Avani in Windhoek and they offered myself and the team great food, great service that I describe to be exceptional. It is excellently neat place and hygienically conducive. I would recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit Namibia.Served by: Christiana

Review Content: The service is absolutely amazing the waiters and waitresses are interactive and they make It feel like home far from home.Especially Mr.FreemanTalk less of the food it absolutely represents the hotel.The rooms are amazing,though it would have been nice to be able to connect with YouTube.But other than that the rooms are almost perfect.

Name: Would go back
Review Content: I had a wonderful time at Avani Hotel in Windhoek. The hotel is located in the heart of the city, with easy access to shopping, dining and attractions. The rooms are spacious, comfortable and well-equipped with everything I needed. The staff were friendly, helpful and professional. The service was impeccable and the food was delicious. I especially loved the Stratos Restaurant with its stunning views and amazing dishes. The casino was also a lot of fun and added some excitement to my stay. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Windhoek.

Let me not forget about the service, Justina was of our assistance from the entrance of the restaurant,she made sure she got us a table outside even though there was no space available, she has such an amazing personality, incredibly professional and clearly take pride in her work, very impressive. Name: Zimmer 610 war echt super! Pool am Dach kann man vergessen!
Review Content: Für die letzte Nacht in Namibia haben wir uns im Kalahari Sands niedergelassen.Echt gut waren zB der early check in und der late check out - kostenlos natürlich.Unser Zimmer 610 war echt super und vor allem super sauber.Lage (wie schon oft erwähnt) sehr zentral!Personal beim Frühstück könnte wirklich netter sein.Ein Besuch beim Pool war sehr enttäuschend - da zu klein und es gab auch keinen Getränkeservice.Trotzdem sehr gutes Hotel!

Name: Good location - Still more than reasonable
Review Content: According to a recent reviewer we were to "avoid at all costs", so I was a little hesitant suggesting to a colleague that we stay at the hotel - but I had stayed here for 3 nights in October last year. Glad I decided to ignore the caution. Check-in was quick and smooth for both of us; small issue with room settled quickly. Rooms still very good.We did not have dinner in the hotel so cannot comment but visited restaurants  within walking distance from hotel for 3 dinners a short cab ride for the others.Breakfast still a very good selection - especially for variety of choice. Found most staff friendly and accommodating. Casino less noisy than previous time.PS. Well done to Namibia on winning COSAFA Cup - possibly the GM could have made more use of this event  in marketing to residents the respective evenings when Namibia were playing...?
Date: Date of stay: May 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Stylisch
Review Content: Für namibische Verhältnisse stylisches Hotel mit schöner Dachterrasse und Blick über Windhoek. Zentrale Lage in der kleinen Innenstadt von Windhoek mit guten Shoppingmöglicheiten.Zimmer waren sauber. Frühstück gut. Wobei die Brotauswahl - Toastbrot weiss oder braun - etwas dürftig war.
Date: Date of stay: March 2020This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good, comfortable hotel which could be great with some minor changes
Review Content: This is one of the best hotels in downtown Windhoek. We found the room to be large, clean and comfortable. We had two queen-sized beds with good, firm matresses. Wifi worked fine and had a decent speed. There is a parking lot in the same building, where customers can park for free (it is a shopping mall). The bathroom had a bathtub and a shower. Things to improve: there was no electric plug in the bathroom, nor a shaving/magnifying mirror. More plugs in the bedroom would also help.Overall,a very good option in Central Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: August 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Used to visit often
Review Content: We were frequent visitors to this hotel for the past 17 years and it improved a lot over the years - especially aesthetically.  There service was never VERY great, but acceptable. We used to buy there Privileged Portfolio package on a yearly basis which gave us great discounts as Namibians, but since last year we were not contacted to join and started going to the Hilton instead. We tried to book there about 2 months ago but the prices were exuberant ! I would say they are over priced. There buffet is also very expensive in comparison to other hotels. They should make the variety less and decrease the price. Its not necessary to provide that big a variety and then have to charge that much. Breakfast is very expensive. You can get much better at many places all over Windhoek for less.  Overall the hotel is good, but we do not feel like going there anymore.
Date: Date of stay: August 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Not bad if you want to wake up at 06:00 the sounds of construction.
Review Content: So all in all not bad. We arrived and we told they're overbooked. Unfortunately this process seems to grind to a halt as if they're waiting for someone to checkout hoping the problem solves itself. After around 45 minutes, I was told I had an upgrade so all appeared great. What they didn't tell me is outside of my widow is a construction site and they start piling and driving trucks at 6am. It's not a nice way to wake up and if only they told me, i wouldn't have leapt out of bed thinking we're under attack.
Date: Date of stay: July 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Angenehmes Hotel für die erste Nacht in Namibia
Review Content: Hotel mitten in der Stadt gelegen, gut mit dem Auto zu erreichen, gute Parkmöglichkeiten (überwachtes Parkhaus)Zimmer sind sehr sauber, Badezimmer ebenso. Geräumig und angenehm. Großer Pluspunkt: Obwohl das Zimmer erst für den Abend gebucht, konnten wir schon morgens früh um 8 h einchecken und das Zimmer nutzen. Der Poolbereich war während unseres Aufenthaltes in Renovierung. Hotelrestaurant mit Buffet am Abend, Frühstück am Morgen, beides sehr annehmbar.
Date: Date of stay: June 2011This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Conveniently located
Review Content: Good overall hotel conveniently located near the major (few) tourist attractions in Windhoek.We got a room on the 10th floor which had some view over the city (probably on the wrong side of the building since the best view was on the other side) but the room was clean and fairly large. We had dinner on the rooftop restaurant with an amazing view over the city and it was excellent. The service was good as well with an extremely friendly waitress.To mention also that the hotel organized for us the PCR test needed for our flight the next day. Everything went smoothly: nurse and results perfectly on time!
Date: Date of stay: September 2021This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Ottimo hotel al centro di Windhoek
Review Content: L'hotel si trova nel centro di Windhoek, in un bel quartiere moderno, pieno di negozi, a pochi passi dalla chiesa luterana Christuskirche e dall'Independence Memorial Museum. La camera era ampia e confortevole. Il wi-fi gratuito con un buon segnale. I pasti sono a buffet con ampia scelta in un grande ristorante. All'ultimo piano si trova un bar con una terrazza all'aperto dalla quale si gode una bella vista sulla città.
Date: Date of stay: August 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Terrible...
Review Content: Never had such a bad experience! Could not switch lights off when going to bed (something wrong with key card). TV didn't work, aircon didn't work. Shower was hot and cold intermittently. Windows were locked and could not be opened. Staff didn't seem to care when this was explained to them. However, some staff were very friendly and helpful when checking in.

Review Content: I love this hotel. Always clean and stylish and the service is wonderful. Everyone is so friendly. A special thanks to Junius for excellent customer service and walking the extra mile at 3 in the morning :-). A big thanks also to the great airport transfer services we received.

Name: Ankunft und Abflug Windhoek
Review Content: Für Ankunft und Abflug Airport Windhoek ist dieses Hotel als Stopover gut geeignet! Es ist sehr zentral gelegen, sodass die Sehenswürdigkeiten Windhoek's auch zu Fuß gut besuchte werden können, und eine eigene Parketage bietet gute Unterstellmöglichkeiten für ein Mietauto. Das Einchecken verlief unkompliziert, die Zimmer waren groß, sehr sauber und gut möbliert, auch wenn sie als Einzelzimmer gebucht waren, nur der Lift war meistens überlastet. Das Hotel verfügt über ein Restaurant mit netter Terrasse; das Essen wird als Buffet angeboten mit schmackhaften, wechselnden, frisch zubereiteten Gerichten. Lediglich der Service hatte seine Schwierigkeiten u.a. mit der Abrechnung der Getränke. Auch ein späterer Drink auf der Terrasse war schwer zu bekommen.

Name: Zentral und gut!

Name: Zentrales Hotel in Windhoek
Review Content: Die Lage des Hotels in Windhoek ist unschlagbar. Fast alles Sehenswerte ist bequem zu Fuss zu erreichen. Sehr freundliches, professionelles Personal. Name: Great hotel
Review Content: At first a bit worried since you access the hotel through a small mall, but turned out to be very nice. Staff is very helpful and courteous. As checking in we were presented with nice tea cups of hot chocolate, which was welcomed after a long travel day from Cape Town. Room appear to be redone very recently and a upscale. Hallways and lobby is also nice.   Nice bathtubs and separate showers. Rooms have air conditioning. Security is posted at elevator lobby. Hotel staff arranged for transport to and from Joes Beer house for dinner which is a must do especially with kids. Food and service was great.

Name: Outstanding rooms and great location
Review Content: The Kalahari Sands is situated in the centre of Windhoek in a shopping centre. It is part of the Sun International group, making it very convenient for just about everything in the town. I checked into hotel on Sunday and the check in process was very quick with the receptionist very helpful. The room is very big and spacious and very clean. Breakfast was the usual Sun International type of affair and was workmanlike. Staff appeared very disinterested though and not at all helpful. For more this is very disappointing and you almost too scared to ask anything.
Date: Date of stay: May 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very comfortable and clean rooms
Review Content: I checked in on 26th and out 27th October 2013. The location was a bit strange, right in the middle of a shopping mall. There receptionist seemed overwhelmed. She worked alone and there were a number of angry clients as the couldn't access their rooms coz they were still being cleaned at 5pm! Several of us had to wait for a long time to get clean rooms. There seems to be a serious shortage of man power and there was no sign of a manager or supervisor in charge of the hotel.  When I got to my room, I forgot about the waiting.  The room was very nice, comfortable, clean and beautiful. I enjoyed the night and didn't want to go out. I would stay again, anyway!
Date: Date of stay: October 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bon hôtel, mais sans charme.
Review Content: Harassés après le TGV, les vols Paris - Johannesburg - Windhoek (merci Nouvelles Frontières alors qu'il y a des vols directs), enfin l'étape. Globalement satisfaits, nourriture correcte et abondante. Bien situé, mais sans vraie personnalité, comme tous les internationaux. Par contre, problème avec les ascenseurs, toujours pleins à craquer aux moments des repas. Et des pigeons mal en point qui passent la nuit sur le rebord de fenêtre.
Date: Date of stay: October 2012This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Terrible experience
Review Content: The worst hotel experience endured during our stay in Namibia. Arrival - difficult, rude, inefficient, unprofessional reception and other staff. We arrived later than we anticipated due to a flight delay, 7.45pm, with a booked arrival time of 4pm. We checked in only to be told "we are full and busy" and your room is not ready, "ready in 10/15 mins". So we waited just meters from reception counter which is also the entrance to the casino, where non hotel guests also roam around reception area drunk, loud and harassing guests as they enter the hotel entrance. We were never offered a glass of water, complimentary drink at the bar or the suggestion to dine in the restaurant while waiting for the room to be "ready". After 40 mins of waiting in reception, we approached the reception staff to say that this was really not good enough to wait this long for our room - it was now 8.30pm. The only remedy offered was a different room to that of which we booked - at no reduced rate. We thought this was unacceptable as we booked a luxury king room, they offered a standard twin bed room. The reception staff member was so rude and would not listen to our issue any further so he fetched for the duty manager who attended to our booking, apologizing for the inconvenience, and handing us a key card to the room. So we picked up and carried our own bags, finally found the lifts (if you have ever stayed here you know what we mean), reached the room which was nice, clean and spacious. After unpacking and showering we decided not to eat as it was so late, and have a nightcap from the mini bar instead. We couldn't open the fridge for love nor money, it looked locked. So we rang reception……waiting, waiting till it was answered and requested access to the minibar "oh, you have to request it to be unlocked at reception" was told to us.  Well that was never explained by the duty manager or other reception staff. So housekeeping arrived to the room and unlocked the minibar. Accommodation - large and spacious room (as we had booked a luxury king size room) comfy, nice linen, combined bath, shower, loo and vanity area, hair dryer, power points for recharging, desk area with chair, large flat screen TV, minibar (locked), coffee/tea facilities.Food - Dinner was offered somewhere in the hotel, but due to our debacle at reception we chose to not eat at all as it was so late. Breakfast buffet was included in room rate.  Selection and food quality was very good however sleepy bored staff tended to group together laughing and chatting until a supervisor walked past to break them up. The staff would remove your plates and glasses before you had finished with them. You had to keep saying "no" not finished. Minibar issue - at 7am the next morning, we had a knock at the door - it was a staff member wanting to check what we had consumed in the minbar last night! We were showering and dressing at this time, and he was lucky we were not asleep. Outrageous - they do not trust their guests and customers. We left the room at 8am and were chased by a staff member whilst the lift door was closing about the minibar again! Maybe the issue is they don't trust their own staff?Reservations - Book directly with hotel via website, using credit card.Facilities - Small bar near reception, Casino with poker machines.Best - clean rooms, old but well maintained, breakfast buffet (quality and selection of food).Comments - reception staff had an appalling attitude, casino vagrants sculling from wine bottles, drunk, in the reception area.Hint - for those choosing between the Kalahari Sands & Casino or the Hilton Hotel  - Hilton wins 2 hands down - price, location, facilities, food & staff. Stayed at both hotels during our Namibian trip. We also stayed at the Sun International, Sun Hotel in Gaborone with no issues at all.
Date: Date of stay: June 2012This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hotel im Einkaufszentrum mitten in Windhoek
Review Content: Wir sind früh morgens in Windhoek gelandet und konnten unser Zimmer im 7. Stock schon um 10.00 Uhr morgens beziehen. Das Zimmer ist relativ gross, hatte zwei Doppelbetten und man hatte einen Blick auf die Stadt. Das Badezimmer war grosszügig und war für die dortigen Verhältnisse sauber. Das Zimmer müsste mal renoviert werden, die darüberliegenden Etagen wurden gerade renoviert (Baulärm von 9-17 Uhr).Das Hotel ansonsten scheint das beste zu sein, was Windhoek zur Zeit zu bieten hat, schräg gegenüber entsteht ein neues Hilton, dürfte in 3 Monaten fertig sein, scheint dann die bessere Wahl zu sein. Das Parken im Parkhaus ist für Hotelgäste kostenlos.

Name: Lovely, well situated hotel
Review Content: Great hotel in the centre of Windhoek, close to shopping malls, market and cafes. Excellent breakfast and the roof top bar has a fabulous view. The cafe/restaurant downstairs also has good food. Rooms are spacious and the gym is well equipped (2 treadmills, weights, bike and stepper).

Name: Amfsa Conference
Review Content: At Avani Hotel, I exoerienced a warm,friendly reception. All their porters are friendly, willing to assist with all your queries. The room had two double beds, had tea and coffie facilities. A hairdryer is available. They did mention a gown and slippers but I did not have in the room. The bed was comfortable. The airconditioner was not working, even after i reported it to room service.They do have a safe for your valuables.Bathroom facilities included a sanitary pack, shower The food was very good and a good variety to choose from.Overall a very good experience and really enjoyed my stay.
Date: Date of stay: September 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: a bit noisy
Review Content: nice and clean rooms with full equipment, excellent choice of food at dinner buffet. Would be an excellent rating if there wasn't a lot of noise from the street and neighbour bars (music until late), which disturbed our sleep.
Date: Date of stay: August 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Awesome 👍
Review Content: Cool, quite and beautiful, a place to see the city, at night and day, service is great, food is great, relaxation to maximum, easy to find, City center views, shopping malls around, great Break Fast, Recommend highly
Date: Date of stay: June 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Quarta hospedagem em Windhoek
Review Content: O hotel tem variacoes conforme o hospede, eles oferecem up grade mas nao é cortesia, entao nao é atrativo, pois é tarifa normal, mas quem nao le seus direitos podem ser facilmente manipulados pelo atendente da recepcao.POis fica aparecendo inicialmente é se trata de uma cortesia do hotel por ser fiel ao hotel, mas nao é nda disso. Essa é a minha quarta hospedagem a trabalho em Namibia, porem somos tratados como se nao conhesse, como primeira hospedagem....soa estranho. A comunicacao com os servicos nao é eficaz, apos a primeira noite ja queriam dar baixa pensando que iria fazer check out. Os servicos de limpeza e camareira ficou a desejar...solicitei bloco de notas para anotacoes, a resposta foi rapida nas palavras mas nao foi realizada...anteriormente ja tinha encima da cabeceira como em qualquer hotel deste nivel...
Date: Date of stay: May 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Muito bem localizado
Review Content: Hotel localizado na avenida principal de Windhoek, próximo de lojas, cafés e restaurantes. Quartos muito bons, boa casa de banho com banheira e duche separados. Espaços comuns agradáveis com o bar no terraço a ter uma vista óptima sobre a cidade. Pequenos almoços bastante variados. Limpeza irrepreensível e pessoal muito simpático e prestável. A piscina no terraço é muito pequena e fica no meio do bar sem espaço para espreguiçadeiras. Não utilizámos apesar do imenso calor. Recomendo o hotel.
Date: Date of stay: March 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Windhoek
Review Content: O hotel é muito bem localizado na principal avenida de Windhoek. Zona com muito comércio, alguns restaurantes e cafés. O hotel tem acesso directo a um centro comercial.Os quartos são muito bons, o pessoal simpático e eficiente. Pequeno almoço óptimo. O bar na cobertura tem vista para a cidade. Recomendo.
Date: Date of stay: March 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Business trip
Review Content: I was over nighting while having meetings the following day. I was made to feel like an family returning home. The staff was friendly and helpful. Junias especially went out of his way to make my stay enjoyable
Date: Date of stay: January 2019This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Improvement required
Review Content: Having had a vehcile, the parking entrance into the mall was utterly not appealing. There was no one available to assist with our luggage from the car into the mall never mind the avail of trolleys.messy construction work also not appealing. The linen room attendance was dealt with animosity from the attenddee at the time and the breakfast needs a big revamp. This includes the utensils to display layout and variety of offering available. The bread was not fresh and the "balcony" area could do with some energy or life decor. The overall decor is bit dull and grey, no energy or life into the concept and the entrance/exit metal plates by the lifts on the room floors definitely not suited for hotels .
Date: Date of stay: November 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Guter Standard aber nicht Gamechanging!
Review Content: Dieses Hotel war die erste Unterkunft auf meine Namibiarundreise.Besonders gut war erstmal, dass man direkt in dem Gebäude in dem Parkhaus parken kann und nicht erst lange mit Koffern und Co rumlaufen muss.Am Abend warten Prostituierte vor dem Eingang des Parkhauses. Ich habe das nicht überprüft, aber es lag optisch sehr nahe.Das Frühstück hatte mich wirklich sehr begeistert.Optisch ist das Hotel und Zimmer eher normal.Der Rabatt, den die Portale ausweisen ist quatsch. Der Preis ist normal und der alte Preis wäre völlig überzogen.
Date: Date of stay: November 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Visita perfetta, con qualche intoppo
Review Content: Hotel centralissimo, situato sulla rinomata Indipendent Avenue. Camere spaziose, pulite e dotate di comfort quali Wi-Fi gratuito e televisioni molto grandi. Staff di assoluta gentilezza ed educazione. Il ristorante  dell'albergo è discreto e, seppur a buffet, offre una varietà di carne e pesce cucinata al momento, su richiesta del cliente. Venendo alle note negative, bisogna assolutamente segnalare che il casinò assomiglia più ad una sala slot con pochi tavoli e sempre affollatissimi. Inoltre, al momento della mia visita, l'hotel era in ristrutturazione ma, a mio parere, questo non giustifica il fatto che tre ascensori su tre fossero fuori servizio, contemporaneamente, per una buona mezza giornata. Non è nemmeno giustificabile che, dentro al frigo-bar, ci fossero solo due misere bottigliette d'acqua (entrambe naturali), per il resto bisognava chiamare il servizio in camera. Hotel sicuramente consigliato, peccato solo per queste piccoli scivoloni del tutto inaspettati visto il livello della struttura.
Date: Date of stay: August 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: correct
Review Content: bien situé  dans le centre ville, en face il y a un marché artisanal pour les derniers souvenirs à acheter, non bruyant et propre, en ce moment il y a des rénovations cela cause beaucoup de problème avec les ascenseurs
Date: Date of stay: June 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Séjour groupe mai 2018
Review Content: Bel hôtel  bien situé par contre problème d'ascenseur en panne et peu nombreux . Prestations à l'image de la fréquentation importante . Très belle chambre avec une literie confortable. Restauration normale comme un grand établissement . Emplacementidéal pour visiter la capitale .

Name: phenomenal stay!!!!!!
Review Content: Traveled for leisure,didn't know where to stay in Windhoek my boyfriend and I had to do a draw, lol so surprisingly we picked the AVANI HOTEL & CASINO,to my surprise i didn't know we where getting ourselves into the best HOTEL*** thanks to Junias at the reception for making our stay memorable and all the other staff,very friendly indeed.. the room is well appointed with a printer wow!! and everything else that you'd need ..
Date: Date of stay: March 2018This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bra centralt hotell i Windhoek
Review Content: Bra och centralt hotell mitt i Windhoek. Bra rum som man förväntar av ett 4+ hotell. Fin utsikt över staden från rummet och ännu bättre från terassen på taket där poolen ligger. Mycket bra frukost, parkering i parkeringshus i anslutning till hotellet som var gratis för boende. Vi fick vår hyrbil levererad hit och det fungerade mycket bra med parkering, förvaring av bagage och att köra ut från Windhoek. Det finns ett shopping mall i anslutning till hotellet med mat supermarket och restauranger. Till och med ATM utanför dörren. Kändes ok att gå ute i Windhoek dagtid, men skulle aldrig ut och gå på kvällen.
Date: Date of stay: October 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Comodo e centrale
Review Content: Siamo rimasti solo una notte e quindi il giudizio è parziale. Belle stanze, grandi e pulite. L'albergo, moderno e piuttosto anonimo,  è all'interno di un centro commerciale - chiuso la donenica - e quindi un po' poco romantico ma la posizione è comoda e centrale. Un problema sono certamente gli ascensori: nelle ore di punta bisogna fare lunghe attese e se si vogliono usare le scale queste sono poco segnalate. Buono e ampio il buffet per la cena  e abbondante la colazione.
Date: Date of stay: October 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Très bien situé et globalement très bien
Review Content: Nous y avons séjourné une nuit lors de notre circuit Namibien.L'accueil est tout à fait correct. Les chambres sont spacieuses, de qualité équipées d'un frigo, climatisées et la literie excellente.Pour ce qui concerne la restauration, petit bémol, service en Buffet, assez moyen, en tout cas ce soir là. Le service est un peu moyen lui aussi. Par contre le petit déjeuner était très bien, varié, à l'anglaise, à la française, au choix voire complet en choisissant les deux. En Buffet lui aussi proposant des fruits frais excellents.Nous avons trouvé un hôtel calme la nuit et le problème vient de l'utilisation des ascenseurs. Certes des travaux étaient engagés mais le temps d'attente parfois était extrêmement long, même si nous étions en vacances.Cet établissement se situe dans un bâtiment qui abrite de nombreux commerces, intéressant parfois.Nous y avions déjà séjourné en 2014.Globalement très bien.
Date: Date of stay: October 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bon hôtel bien situé
Review Content: Hôtel bien situé à Windhoek qui se trouve dans une galerie marchande et en centre ville. Il dispose d'un parking mais l'accès n'est pas aisé (le parking se trouve derrière l'hôtel, de l'autre coté du pâté de maison). Hôtel de chaine (avec cars de touristes) qui présente peu de charme mais qui dispose de tout le confort nécessaire. Les chambres sont sympathiques et confortables. Le restaurant buffet est assez complet mais les prix sont élevés. Petit déjeuner de qualité avec un choix très satisfaisant. Normalement vous disposerez de la Wifi, en fonction des aléas du jour.....
Date: Date of stay: August 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excelente hotel céntrico
Review Content: El desayuno es fantástico, hasta con zumo de naranja natural, muchos frutos secos y gran variedad de todo. Las habitaciones son grandes. Todo muy limpio y bien situado para todo. Lo único malo es lo lento d l ascensor. El wifi funciona muy bien
Date: Date of stay: August 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good location and price
Review Content: The location and the price is good.There is an adjacent shopping center which is very convenient.The staff is nice.The Elevators are stuck from time to time.The internet is slow and sometimes it is stuck.The shower can be improved.
Date: Date of stay: July 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Newish...
Review Content: I stayed at the Kalahari Sands Hotel a few years ago and remember it being rather dated, smelly and the elevators were built by Otis himself.The Avani, on the other hand, is none of those things - except perhaps the slow elevators. The room was modern, comfortable and well appointed and the buffet at the hotel restaurant was pleasant.I'd definitely go back.
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Spacious, comfortable and impressive service
Review Content: I received great hospitality and quality service at Avani Windhoek. The staff is friendly and always ready to assist. The guest rooms are large and with modern finishes. Beautiful views are an order of each day !Bravo!!
Date: Date of stay: January 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Buenas habitaciones y muy buen desayuno
Review Content: Llegamos por la noche y el problema es que no tiene puerta a la calle sino que se entra por un centro comercial. El llegar de noche desmerece al hotel porque esta lleno de prostitutas y da un poco de miedito. El parking esta vigilado y es gratuito, te sellan el ticket las veces que entres.Ya una vez dentro esta muy bien. Las recepcionistas encantadoras y muy amables. Wifi gratis en las habitaciones.Las habitaciones grandes con un bano bueno con ducha y banera.El desayuno excelente con muchas cosas para elegir y muy atentos.
Date: Date of stay: April 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Avant Hotel
Review Content: Nice rooms, good views of town, great location right downtown.  Casino, restaurant.  Located in building with shopping center and other shops.  Convenient. rooms large, well appointed, comfortable, convenient.
Date: Date of stay: March 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Could not ask for more.
Review Content: Centrally located ideal for business and sight seeing in a city that offers so much.The Avani Windhoek provided me with great service, great amenities and friendly staff that made my stay memorable for all the right reasons.
Date: Date of stay: January 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Buena relación calidad precio
Review Content: En El Centro de Windoek. El hotel es confortable y con habitaciones amplias y silenciosas. Se encuentra en el interior de un centro comercial barato, y su acceso le quita categoría al hotel. Desayuno correcto y variado.
Date: Date of stay: December 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Well maintained but pricey
Review Content: A well equipped hotel where everything works well with a pleasant staff the evening buffet was reasonably priced but overall the property was a little overpriced well located with free parking and excellent wifi
Date: Date of stay: November 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Smack in the Mall
Review Content: This hotel has a good location on Independent Avenue where all the action in Windhoek seems to be. Its location in the mall affords you lots of options in terms of fun and games as well as dining.The rooms are however quite small especially the bathrooms. Please ensure you book correctly otherwise you may end up with two tiny beds in your roomFrom the hotel you can access most government departments. taxis are rarity in Windhoek so plan extra wellThe airport is a cool 40km away so leave early though traffic snarl ups are rare here
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent place to stay. Well positioned in the main city access to any atractions
Review Content: If you're in Windhoek Namibia please visit the Avani Hotel. Well established and very clean. Next to national meseum and walking distance to the atractions. Banks all around and Foreign Exchange. Afrikaans spoken all over Namibia
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Gutes Hotel für einen kurzen Aufenthalt
Review Content: Wir waren die ersten Tage unseres Aufenthalts in Namibia im AVANI. Der Check-In lief ein wenig holprig, was aber größtenteils daran lag dass etwas mit der Buchung über einen Drittanbieter falschgelaufen ist. Es waren alle sehr bemüht um uns und wir hatten relativ schnell unser Zimmer. Die Zimmer sind wie schon von anderen gesagt immer sauber und sehr großzügig geschnitten. Windhoek ist nicht sonderlich belebt und deshalb war unser Zimmer auch schön ruhig. Der Pool auf dem Dach existiert, ist aber nicht zu benutzen. Er ist schlichtweg zu kalt und man hat nach wenigen Sekunden kein Gefühl in den Füßen.
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Comodo e Centrale
Review Content: Già utilizzato un paio di anni fa, non posso che confermare il giudizio espresso precedentemente. Posizione centrale, belle stanze e comodo parcheggio interno.La sensazione da hotel d'affari, completo di Casinò, è bilanciata dall'efficienza del personale e dalla comodità della presenza, nello stesso edificio, di un piccolo centro commerciale e di un supermercato. Tutto perfetto per farne una buona base di partenza per i tour namibiani.
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Prima hotel
Review Content: Waren hier eerste en laatste dag£/nacht van een rondreis door Namibie en hadden een kamer op het 7de verdiep. Alles was nieuw of in uitstekende staat en werkte goed. Mensen aan de receptie waren heel gedienstig om mee te helpen om vervoer van en naar luchthaven te regelen etc. De prijzen van de SPA  waren OK en de diensten waren van goed niveau.We hebben 2 maal gegeten 's avonds in het hotelrestaurant, was buffet formule en keus was goed. 2 X ontbijtbuffet van goede kwaliteit. Aanvullen van wat leeg was verliep echter allesbehalve snel.Al met al is dit hotel een goede keus vermits zijn centrale ligging in Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: June 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great Lunch Buffet
Review Content: As my wife and I were looking for a place to have lunch in central Windhoek, we happened by chance upon the buffet restaurant one floor above street level. The choice and variety of the food offerings is excellent, ranging from seafood to steaks, plus a wide range of salads and desserts. You get it all for a mere $10 per person. In my view probably one of the best deals in central Windhoek,
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Früher Kalahari Sands
Review Content: Leider Haben Die neuen Eigentümer den Namen geändert(müssen?). Der neue Name ist nichtssagend.Wir mögen das Hotel, da die Zimmer grosszügig und modern ausgelegt sind. Die Rezeption ist dehr freundlich, Das Frühstück sehr gut, abgesehen von den typischen unzulänglichkeiten, dass z.b. es keine Rolls(Brötchen) mehr gibt, oder du dem Personal mitteilen musst, wenn eine Schale oder ein Tablett leer ist und nachgefüllt werden muss. Die Lage ist Ausgezeichnet im "Laufabstand" zu vielen Geschäften und Sehenswürdigkeiten. Nachteil "der Haupteingang". Vor dem Hotel kann man nicht parken, es gibt kein "sichtbares" Hotelersonal um den Gästen aus dem Taxi bzw. dem Auto zu helfen. Es gibt keine "Hotelvorfahrt" wenn man mit dem eigenen Auto kommt, muss man wissen das man auf eine Paralellstrasse(Rückgebäude) fahren muss um auf die Parkplätze des Hotels im ca. 6. Stock? zu gelangen. Zur Rezeption zu Fuss gelangt man nur über eine Rolltreppe wenn man von der  Hauptstrasse kommt. Wen man einmal durchblickt, dann gehts.Anyway, Das Hotelpersonal ist professionell, hilfsbereit und wir haben uns dort wohl gefühlt.
Date: Date of stay: March 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Review Content: this is probably the most central hotel in Windhoek. It is part of a shopping complex and boasts a casino and restaurant. Rooms have all the basic necessities. Slightly dated and the finishes are looking a bit tired.

Name: Casino hotel
Review Content: Comfortable and better than fair sized room with a good bathroom and nice detached shower unit. Hotel was clean and complimentary buffet breakfast beyond what I expected. A bit of a delay checking-in as only one person on duty at reception but nothing too trying. I popped into the casino for a bit. Usual assortment of mainly oriental gamblers. I felt comfortable at the blackjack table and it was friendly enough. Given a complimentary beer and felt that I could have asked for another one or two if I had wished.
Date: Date of stay: December 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Bad security
Review Content: In the hotel parking my car and another guests' car was broken into and the management has done very little to compensate for this. We could not even get any assistance until 2 days after the incident. The parking and the hotel are in a dangerous area of Windhoek and the management have been keeping me in circles
Date: Date of stay: November 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great location but average hotel
Review Content: The location of this hotel is great, right downtown. So it is easy to walk, shop,etc. Lots of construction made accessing some of the governmental buildings a challenge. The hotel itself is nice enough. Rooms are decent sized. Bathroom is large but shower is a bit tight. Had breakfast and dinner in the restaurant. Buffet was disappointing and rather expensive. The ownership change (from Kalahari Sands to Avani) happened during our stay.  The new owners held a rather loud celebration the second night of our stay which we could hear in our room on the 8th floor. Not a good introduction to the new ownership.
Date: Date of stay: June 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very good long stay!
Review Content: Let me start by saying that I stayed at the Kalahari Sands for over 2 months, so my impressions are not those of the casual passer-by. I can't find a fault with this hotel. The rooms are very nice and spacious. The housekeeping is simply perfect and there is never a missing amenity or anything to complain about. The housekeeping staff are also very nice and will always greet you with a smile (as opposed to those at Reception). The turn-down service with the chocolate is a very nice detail. I can't say much about the restaurant or the bar because I didn't go there often. The breakfast was very good and varied. They serve a buffet for lunch and dinner, the main reason why I didn't go there for my meals, but I assume those who do like buffets would find it very good, as they serve very fresh products and of good quality. The swimming pool is on the terrace and it's rather small. It does get windy up there so it's not always comfortable. It's the one place of the hotel which seems to be left to be a bit neglected. If you want service up there, you have to call downstairs so it's a bit odd. The bar has live music on Friday evenings, not sure about Saturdays.The spa is really nice but book in advance because it can get very busy, especially on Friday afternoon and Saturdays. The gym is not inside the hotel but in the shopping center downstairs. Ask at reception and they'll give you a day pass and direct you to it. It's great for a cardio work-out but very weak on weight training. I found only 1-2 kg free weights and a 10kg bar. There are some machines for the lower body and they were adding some for the upper body. If you go after 5.15pm you'll face the crowds and will have to fight for space. Good thing is it's open from 5am to 10pm and is also open on Saturdays and Sundays almost all day. I can't say anything about the casino because I never went in there. The location of the hotel is also very good, in the downtown, close to restaurants and shops. Apart from the shopping center downstairs, which is very convenient, there is also another shopping center/mall a couple of blocks away.I would definitely recommend the hotel and would go back there without hesitating. Don't let yourself be badly impressed by the receptionists; after all, you'll only see them twice during your stay.
Date: Date of stay: January 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Educational
Review Content: The best hotel I ever stayed in. Nice and accommodating staff. Good food, excellent location and the rooms are so comfortable. I also liked the view from my room. You find it in the heart of Windhoek. Close enough to all important public buildings.
Date: Date of stay: April 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: 2 Nächte vor einer Rundreise
Review Content: Wir sind nach Windhoek geflogen und waren vor unserer Rundreise ab Swakopmund noch 2 Nächte im Kalahari Sands. Die Zimmer und das Bad sind ausreichend groß, sauber und die Betten hervorragend. Die Lage in der Innenstadt ist bestens und man kann alles zu Fuß erreichen. Frühstück ist sehr gut, obwohl der Frühstücksraum relativ klein ist. Es gibt für jeden Geschmack etwas. Auch Preis-/Leistung für das Zimmer mit Frühstück ist sehr angemessen. Ich würde das Hotel für einen Aufenthalt in Windhoek bestens empfehlen, insbesondere da in der Innenstadt.
Date: Date of stay: September 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: very comfortable, let down by smoking in the foyer
Review Content: I loved my room which was spacious, clean and comfortable. I was on the 14th floor and had a wonderful view of windhoek! The breakfast buffet had really good variety all throughout my stay and i found the staff friendly. The location is superb, right in the heart of windhoek. Here's the problem: smoking is permitted in the lobby. I mean this is a public (and enclosed) area! It was a most unpleasant experience to be assailed by second hand smoke during check in. To make matters worse, ashtrays were not regularly emptied. Memo to hotel management: second-hand smoke is vile and hazardous.
Date: Date of stay: December 2012This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: The best times are over ...
Review Content: The hotel is situated in the middle of the city center on top of a shopping mall. This is supposed to be one of the top hotels in Windhoek. Maybe it was some time ago.The staff is very helpfull and professional. Rooms are not very nice (interieur, colors) and look a little bit used. You have to wait ages for an elevator. The inhouse restaurant offers buffets, but there are definetly cheaper and better places to go for lunch or dinner. I guess that the only reason for this place being popular is the casino.
Date: Date of stay: December 2009This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Es war zum Glück nur eine Nacht
Review Content: In diesem Hotel hat uns nichts gefallen ausser der Lage.Bereits die Ankunft mit dem Auto ist unschön - das Parkhaus ist dunkel und wenn man  Sonntag am frühen Nachmittag ankommt schleppt man seine Koffer ewig weit über Treppen durch ein leeres Einkaufszentrum - einen Wagen zum Koffertransport gibt es nicht. (Falls es einen Weg ohne Treppen gab, war der nicht ausgeschildert und der Parkplatzwächter des Hotels war nicht zuständig).Check-in dauert lange - obwohl alles leer ist.  Man sollte sich bereits dort den Schlüssel für die Minibar/Kühlschrank geben lassen, die ist sonst abgeschlossen und es dauert lange, bis jemand mit einem Schlüssel kommt. Die Zimmer sind renovierungsbedürftig und wirken leicht angeschmuddelt und düster. Sie waren allerdings sauber und ausreichend groß. Eine kaputte Glühbirne am Nachttisch am Sonntag zu wechseln war ausserhalb der Möglichkeiten des Hotels.Was sonst noch nicht funktioniert hat: -Telefon (leider die gesamte Anlage ausgefallen, so dass man nicht nach draußen telefonieren konnte, aber am Sonntag ist halt nichts zu machen), -der Weckruf (kam eine halbe Stunde zu spät - das kann nicht am Sonntag gelegen haben, inzwischen war Montag) -Frühstück aufs Zimmer (war bestellt, kam nicht - aber es ist schließlich am Tag nach Sonntag. Es kam dann nach vielem Telefonieren ein Kaffee, aber der war vermutlich vom Vortag, lauwarm, abgestanden und gallebitter)-Fahrstühle (wir haben zum Glück im 4. Stock gewohnt, so dass wir statt 10 Minuten pro Weg zu warten, lieber Treppen gestiegen sind.Was uns am Hotel gefallen hat - es liegt sehr zentral. Man kann die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuss erreichen (Post Street, Alte Feste, Christus Kirche, Parlament, Tintenpalast). Im Cafe am Zoo schräg gegenüber kann man auch am Sonntag gut und in schöner Atmosphäre essen - allerdings nur bis 20.00 Uhr. Am Hotel selber hat uns nichts gefallen - wir würden sicher nicht noch einmal dort bleiben.
Date: Date of stay: September 2009This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: An OK Place to stay
Review Content: This hotel is an OK place to start or finish your tour of Namibia, but it is definitely for passing through.It's a typical 'corporate' hotel which, once you're inside could be anywhere. Having said that it does its job pretty well, being in the town centre and OK for the airport.When we were there 2 out of 3 lifts were working, the third was in the process of being replaced and lokked like it should be finished soon, but there was no problem.Everything was fine without being outstanding.If you want a nice meal try the Zoo Gardens Restaurant in the park just down the street.The casino is not really 'in your' face' - it's there if you want it
Date: Date of stay: April 2008This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Avani Hotel-Pleasant Stay/Positive Experience
Review Content: All my previous business trips to Windhoek, I stayed at the Hilton Windhoek hotel(twice). My third business trip I stayed at the Avani hotel, I had a pleasant stay and a positive experience about the hotel and the employees. The Avani rooms and bed sizes are very nice and comfortable , and the bathrooms are also very nice and the come with privacy compared to the Hilton Windhoek hotel’s bathrooms. The staff at the Avani Dunes Restaurant especially Christy, Zudre, and Ziggy are very kind, welcoming, and attentive to guests. I will definitely consider the Avani hotel again for my next business. Although the brand name Avani may not be as popular as other chain hotels, I would consider it a hidden nice and comfortable  hotel with the same amenities you would expect from other well known hotel brand names in Windhoek. Give it a try, and you may be pleasantly surprised especially if you stayed in other hotels during your previous trips to Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: February 2024This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Staff was very supporting, forthcoming and respectful. Would recommend staying at Avani for anyone visiting Windhoek. Special shout-out to few staff members, Zudre,  Christiana & other team members from dunes who took great care during brkfast; every one of the staff at Pantry for lunch & dinner.

Name: A promising hotel in Windhoek
Review Content: Avani Windhoek is still undergoing renovations and facelift as at December 26th 2019 when I visited . The reception area and rooms have been redone, and are in great shape.The presidential site is spacious and tastefully designed. Done defects with plumbing works but these should be easily corrected. It's best bargain and value for family. The restaurant is still in a bad state, the furniture there is old and rugged , ambience and lighting are poor. I acknowledge though the renovations were still ongoing,do this review may not accurately paint the right picture after say six months after its publication. Service and good at the were good. Location is great.

Name: Kein Touristen-Hotel

Am nächsten Morgen um 8 Uhr (ich lag noch im Bett), klopfte jemand an unserer Türe. Der Herr wollte die Minibar checken, was wir getrunken hätten?? Das habe ich also noch nie im Leben erwähnt. Fazit: Gutes Business-Hotel, aber nicht für Ferien, da gibt es also viel besseres!
